description.hltext_display: مناقشة خطة مواجهة الأمراض المعدية بالحديدة
description.content: المؤتمرنت- الحديدة - وليدغالب - ناقش الاجتماع الذي عقد بمحافظة الحديدة "غرب اليمن" وضم الدكتورعبدالكريم راصع وزير الصحة والسكان,واحمد سالم الجبلي محافظ الحديدة متطلبات المحافظة في القطاع الصحي ، أوضاع المستشفيات المركزية ، وضرورة إعادة تأهيل مستشفى الشهيد العلفي ، بالإضافة إلى إيجاد الحلول لمشكلة مركز الغسيل الكلوي بمدينة الحديدة وتشغيل مراكز الغسيل الكلوي في مديريتي زبيد ، والقناوص. وكذا مناقشة جوانب تفعيل أنشطة مكافحة نواقل الأمراض ، الى جانب استعراض الخطة المشتركة بين وزارة الصحة العامة والسكان ، والسلطة المحلية في المحافظة لمكافحة للأمراض ، وخاصة مرضي الملاريا وحمى الضنك ، وتفعيل دور إدارة التثقيف الصحي والمجتمعات المحلية في التوعية بمخاطر الأمراض وطرق الوقاية . واكد وزير الصحة العامة و السكان أن تسع فرق للرش الضبابي والرش بالمبيد ذو الأثر الباقي لمكافحة الملاريا ستبدأ يوم غد الأربعاء عملية الرش في مديريات حيس والتحيتاء والزهرة وباجل والزيدية التابعة لمحافظة الحديدة. موضحا أنه يتم حالياً التحضير لتنفيذ الحملة الموسعة للرش بالمبيد الأثر الباقي خلال شهر يناير المقبل ، مشيرا الى ان الحملة تستهدف 106 آلاف منزل ابتداءً من وادي مور حتى مديرية حيس ، وتوزيع أدوية مكافحة الملاريا على 47 مديرية في محافظات الحديدة و حجة والمحويت وريمة وكشف وزير الصحة أنه سيتم خلال شهر مايو المقبل البدء بتنفيذ المستشفى المركزي بمدينة الصالح الطبية بالحديدة بتكلفة 60 مليون دولار. والذي من المتوقع ان تصل طاقته الاستيعابية الى 400 سرير في كافة التخصصات الطبية. واضاف أنه سيعقد بعد غد الخميس اجتماع موسع في ديوان المحافظة يضم كافة مديري مكاتب الصحة والتربية والتعليم والصحة المدرسية والزراعة والأوقاف وصحة البيئة في المديريات لمناقشة آليات المكافحة للأمراض المعدية في المحافظة ودور كل قطاع في ذلك، منوها بجهود وزارة الصحة العامة والسكان في مكافحة الأمراض. .الى ذلك تفقد وزير الصحة العامة والسكان ومحافظ الحديدة سير العمل في مقر البرنامج الوطني لمكافحة ودحر الملاريا محور تهامة ، واستمعا من مدير عام البرنامج الدكتور عادل الجساري إلى شرح مفصل حول الإمكانيات المتوفرة ، وتجهيزاته الطبية الخاصة بالمكافحة . كما تفقدا مخازن المحور وما يحتويه من الناموسيات وماكينات الرش وغيرها من مستلزمات مكافحة الملاريا ، واطلع على الآلية الجديدة للتشخيص التي تستخدم في المناطق التي لا توجد فيها مختبرات طبية . وشددا على سرعة توزيع الكميات المناسبة من الناموسيات للمديريات المستهدفة. Tweet تعليق إرسل الخبر إطبع الخبر RSS حول الخبر إلى وورد معجب بهذا الخبر انشر في فيسبوك انشر في تويتر

description.hltext_display: 這才是 Google Docs（以 Presentation 為例）真正的實力呀！
description.author: Casper Kao
description.content:
2010年就要過去了，不來點技術展示，怎麼對得起廣大的Google服務使用者呢？沒錯！Google最近就丟出了一個名叫Google Demo Slam的活動，讓大家上網參觀殘酷舞台，並且投下神聖的一票。
當中看來頗值得大家注意的示範之一，則是上面（影片在跳轉後）這組由三位分居三地的動畫師，耗時三天，僅開一個Google Docs文件（Presentation）就完成的曠世巨作，而預設跟這Google Docs動畫PK的，則是由網壇正妹莎娃領銜主演的Voice Search示範，不過目前看來死會正妹威能還是遠大於這三位動畫師的努力。
如果看完該影片，對於該投影片興趣更濃厚的話，不妨到這來看個仔細。 %u7E7C%u7E8C%u95B1%u8B80%u5168%u6587這才是Google Docs（以Presentation為例）真正的實力呀！

description.hltext_display: الإرياني يشيد بالدور المعتدل لمدرسة حضرموت
description.content:
المؤتمر نت – خالد بن عمور -
الإرياني يشيد بالدور المعتدل و المشرف الذي لعبته مدرسة حضرموت
أشاد الدكتور عبدا لكريم الإرياني المستشار السياسي لرئيس الجمهورية بالدور المعتدل و المشرف الذي لعبته مدرسة حضرموت والتي تأسست قبل مئات السنين وأشعت بعلمائها ودعوتها إلى جميع إرجاء العالم وبالذات في شرق أسيا.
مشيدا أيضا بما شهدته مدينة تريم بمحافظة حضرموت من نهضة ثقافية وما نفذ فيها من مشاريع وإعمال ترميم لمعالمها التاريخية والأثرية أضفت على تلك المعالم المزيد من الالق والجمال وأظهرتها بالمظهر الحضاري اللائق بها كعاصمة للثقافة الإسلامية 2010م. معتبرا أن هذه المشاريع تعكس الاهتمام الكبير الذي تولية القيادة السياسية ممثلة بفخامة رئيس الجمهورية علي عبدا لله صالح والحكومة لهذه المدينة التي تستعيد اليوم دورها التاريخي والعلمي من خلال اعتمادها عاصمة للثقافة الإسلامية 2010م،لتؤكد من جديد مكانتها التاريخية والعلمية والثقافية كمنارة للعلم والعلماء وصل أشعاعها إلى شعوب جنوب شرق آسيا حيث انتشر الإسلام بفضل سلوك الوسطية والاعتدال والقدوة الحسنة والدعوة إلى الإسلام بالحكمة والموعظة الحسنة وبفضل حسن المعاملات وتمثل قيم الصدق والأمانة والسلام التي هي روح ديننا الإسلامي الحنيف
جاء ذلك في تصريح خاص لموقع (المؤتمر نت ) على هامش مشاركته في المؤتمر الدولي الوسطية الشرعية والاعتدال الواعي مدرسة حضرموت أنموذجا الذي بدء إعماله امس بمنطقة الحسيسة الواقعة بين مدنتي تريم وسيؤن.
منوها بان مؤتمر الوسطية الشرعية والاعتدال الواعي مدرسة حضرموت أنموذجا يعد من أهم المؤتمرات التي تعقد خلال هذا العام 2010م كونه سيرسخ رؤية دولية للوسطية الشرعية في الاسلام بعيد عن التطرف والغلو.
مشير إلى انه من مدارس وأربطة مدينة تريم انطلقت قوافل الدعاة حاملين راية الاسلام والسلام في القرن الخامس عشر إلى أصقاع العالم ، معبرا عن سعادته بالمشاركة في هذا المؤتمر الذي يشارك فيه نخبة من علماء اليمن والعالم الإسلامي والذي جاء هذا المؤتمر ليبرز حقيقة تريم ومدرستها وعلماءها ورجالها الذي كان لهم باع طويل على مدى التاريخ في نشر الدين الإسلامي وعلومه .
مضيفا: ان ما سمعه من المتحدثين من العلماء الأفاضل سوى كانوا من أبناء حضرموت او الذين أتوا من خارج الوطن قد أعطاء صورة مشرقة للسلام المعتدل وللمدرسة الحضرمية التي استطاعت ان تنشر الاسلام بالموعظة الحسنة دون أكراه ودون كسر.
منوها بان هذا اكبر دليل على ان الدعوة الإسلامية ليست بحاجة إلى من يستخدمون العنف او ينشرون الكراهية كون الاسلام ينتشر بالكلمة الحسنة وبالسلوك الطيب ونموذج مدرسة حضرموت هو أفضل وأروع نموذج في العالم الإسلامي بأكمله .
منوها بان مدينة تريم هي شعلة مضاءة على مر العصور والأزمان تضيئي دروب الدعوة إلى الله تعالى وإلى كتابه وسنة نبينا محمد صلى الله علية وسلم بعيدا عن الغلو والمغالاة.
وعن توقعاته بالنتائج التي سيخرج بها المؤتمر قال لاشك ان المحاضرات والوثائق التي سيتم مناقشتها ستظهر على شكل كتاب قيم اعتقد انه سيستفيد منه دعاة الاسلام من جميع إنحاء العالم الإسلامي
هذا وتعد مدينة تريم العاصمة الدينية لوادي حضرموت حيث كانت ولا تزال مركزا يشع منه نور العلم والمعرفة ومركز إشعاع ديني منذ ظهور الإسلام حيث أقيمت الأربطة الدينية ومراكز تعليم وتحفيظ القرآن الكريم وتدريس الفقه الإسلامي وغيرها من فروع العلوم الدينية ،وكان طلاب العلم يتوافدون من المناطق اليمنية والدول المجاورة والشرق الأقصى وشرق أفريقيا حيث ساعد على ذلك كثرة علمائها وزواياها العامرة بالتدريس .وقد سميت تريم بهذا الاسم حسب ما جاء في كتاب (معجم البلدان) لياقوت الحموي

description.hltext_display: KARO BIO: EMISSION FULLTECKNAD, 98,3% MED STÖD AV RÄTTER
description.content:
STOCKHOLM (Direkt) Karo Bios företrädesemission har
fulltecknats efter att 98,3 procent av de nya aktierna
tecknades med stöd av teckningsrätter. Resterande 1,7 procent
tilldelades utan stöd av rätter.
Totalt inkom anmälningar om teckning utan stöd av
rätter för drygt 103 miljoner aktier, eller 44 procent av
emissionen.
Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande.
Emissionsbeloppet uppgår till cirka 325 miljoner
kronor.
Börsredaktionen +46 8 5191 7911
Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

description.hltext_display: Grayson Co. to pay jurors in cash
description.author: KXII-TV Staff Email Address: firstnews@kxii.com Video
description.content:
GRAYSON COUNTY, TX - If you serve on a Grayson County jury, you'll soon be getting cash money.
Grayson County Commissioners voted yesterday to allow jurors to be paid in cash for their services if they chose rather than having a check mailed to them. District Clerk Kelly Ashmore requested the change, telling commissioners that paying in cash is more convenient for jurors and saves the county money.
"It is cost effective for the county in that we have three different departments that have to process these checks, we have to pay to write the checks, and to mail them and for the paper, even the ink," Ashmore says.
Jurors in Grayson County are paid $10 for the first day of service and $40 for each additional day.

event_or_fact.property: It is cost effective for the county in that we have three different departments that have to process these checks, we have to pay to write the checks, and to mail them and for the paper, even the ink

description.hltext_display: Joan Rosell creu que és el moment d'engegar reformes valentes per sortir de la crisi
description.content:
El flamant president de la CEOE aposta perquè es cobri una pensió en funció dels dies treballats
EFE / LAMALLA.CAT
Opcions article
Clica aquí per escoltar
Opcions enllaços externs
Joan Rosell, escollit aquest dimarts president de la patronal espanyola (la CEOE), comença en el càrrec amb ganes de fer feina. Ja en el discurs posterior a la seva elecció, l'empresari català va animar als seus col·legues a encetar una nova etapa, en la qual cal convèncer als partits polítics que les reformes són la "millor medicina" per al futur del país i per superar la crisi. Després, en una una entrevista concedida a TV3, Rosell ha reiterat aquesta intenció "de tornar a situar les peticions de la patronal" en l'agenda política i posar en marxa "reformes en la bona direcció".
Notícies relacionades
Joan Rosell, nou president de la CEOE [21/12/2010]
Enllaços
Sobre el cas concret de la reforma de les pensions, que és la que hores d'ara té sobre la taula el Govern, Rosell ha assegurat que, segons el seu parer, la prestació s'hauria de cobrar "en funció dels dies treballats". Ha dit que cada treballador hauria de poder "triar amb llibertat" quan es vol jubilar.
Una altra reforma important, segons l'empresari, és aprimar l'administració. "No cal tenir por" a aplicar "reconversions" en l'administració, igual que s'ha fet en diferents sectors econòmics, ha dit. En aquest sentit, ha apuntat que entre tots cal identificar i tallar els excessos perquè l'important "és tenir una administració forta i sobretot eficient.
També ha advocat perquè s'ajudi els més febles a trobar una feina i per la defensa de l'estat del benestar, fent totes les reformes necessàries i com més aviat millor perquè puguin ser "païdes" més ràpidament. Sobre això, ha insistit que els empresaris han de fer-se sentir en la política, fet que suposa ser "actius" i no passius i "tenir veu" amb plantejaments raonats, però contundents.
Dins de la CEOE, Rosell es fixa com a primers objectius reduir el número de vicepresidències, que actualment són 21 a 9 per fer una organització més àgil. Arturo Fernández, president de la Cambra de Comerç de Madrid, ja ha confirmat que ocuparà la vicepresidència primera. Els noms de la resta persones que ocuparan les vicepresidències es coneixeran a la Junta Directiva del proper dimarts.
També té el repte de millorar la imatge de la patronal, després dels problemes de l'anterior president, Gerardo-Díaz Ferran. En aquest punt, però, Rosell ha volgut valorar "la bona gestió" que ha fet el seu antecessor al capdavant de la patronal. Finalment, sobre la candidatura del seu contrincant, Santiago Herrero i Jesús Bánegas, Rosell ha indicat que "tots som pocs i tots som necessaris" i que "a la mínima que vulguin" formaran part del nou òrgan de govern de la CEOE.

description.hltext_display: "Bauer sucht Frau": Bauer Johannes - das sagt er zum Liebes-Wirrwarr
description.content: Er sorgte in der aktuellen " Bauer sucht Frau"-Staffel für das größte Liebes-Wirrwarr: Bauer Johannes. Erst gestand ihm seine Auserwählte Anja, dass sie von einem anderen schwanger ist, dann musste er selbst zugeben, dass auch er ein Kind mit einer anderen Frau erwartet. Trotz des Chaos begannen

description.hltext_display: After 35 years, Carter Co. District Judge retires
description.author: KXII-TV Staff Email Address: firstnews@kxii.com Video
description.content:
ARDMORE, OK - After 35 years on the bench, District Judge Tom S. Walker is retiring.
Walker is well known for wearing a crimson robe in court and being a fierce advocate for children and veterans. Judge Walker was presented a certificate of appreciation from the Supreme Court of Oklahoma at his retirement ceremony today. He says he's not sure what his plans will be in retirement, but says he will miss being in the courtroom.
"Children's cases. That's been my passion for 35 years, and that's where I think or I hope that I've made the biggest contribution, and I really am going to miss that a lot," Walker said.
Dennis Morris was elected District 20 Office 1 Judge in November.

description.hltext_display: 엔씨소프트 창단의사에 롯데만 시기상조
description.content:
엔씨소프트의 제9구단 창단의향서 제출에 프로야구 구단들은 환영의 뜻을 나타냈다. 한 구단만 반대했다. 두산, LG, 삼성 등 7개 구단은 환영의 뜻을 나타냈지만 롯데는 시기상조라는 뜻을 비쳤다.
7개구단은 일단 엔씨소프트라는 기업이 창단의향서를 제출한 것에 대해 9구단 창단이 가시화 된 것이라는 측면에서 환영했다. KIA 김조호 단장은 "야구 저변확대와 고용창출 등의 효과에 있어 9구단 창단은 바람직하다"고 했고, LG 백순길 단장은 "추가 창단은 대승적 차원에서 환영한다"고 했다.
하지만 9구단이 현재 넥센과 같이 재정적인 어려움을 겪어서는 안된다는 뜻도 보였다. SK 민경삼 단장은 "내실있는 창단을 유도했으면 하는 바람이다"라고 했고, LG 백 단장도 "엔씨소프트가 프로야구를 정상적으로 운영할 수 있을지를 검증하는 과정이 필요하다"고 했다.
두산 김승영 단장은 "엔씨소프트는 탄탄한 회사로 알고 있다. 일본에서도 소프트웨어 업체인 라쿠텐이 프로야구를 하는 게 트렌드인데 미래 지속성과 재무적 안정성에서 본다면 엔씨소프트를 긍정적으로 본다"고 했다.
하지만 롯데는 9,10구단 창단에 시기상조라는 뜻을 보였다. 장병수 사장은 "최근 3년 사이에 야구팬이 증가했다. 이럴 때일수록 구단을 늘리기 보다는 좀 더 내실을 기해야 한다"고 했다. "인구가 3억명인 미국도 30개 구단이고 1억3000만명인 일본도 12개 구단밖에 안된다. 그만큼 야구단 운영이 힘들다는 거다"라는 장 사장은 "지금 현재 한국 실정에서 8개구단도 결코 적은 숫자가 아니다. 내실을 기해야 할 때다"라고 했다. 장 사장은 야구장 시설 확충, 더 나은 서비스, 선수와 코치 확대 등을 통한 야구의 질 향상이 현재 야구의 인기를 유지하기 위해 노력해야 할 것으로 꼽았다.
좀 더 현실적으로 보자고 했다. "이전에 야구단을 했던 기업들에게 물어보면 알 것이다. 야구단 운영은 밑빠진 독에 물붓기다. 열성팬이 있는 롯데도 아직 흑자를 내지 못하고 있다. 먼저 야구단이 자생능력을 갖추도록 해야한다"며 "몇몇 야구인들이 공명심에 구단을 늘리려고 하는데 구단만 늘려놓고 부실하게 야구를 하면 결국 팬들이 떠나갈 것이다"라며 반대의사를 분명히 했다. 권인하 기자 indyk@sportschosun.com

description.hltext_display: 【有馬記念】スポニチ予想陣討論１ ブエナビスタの気になる点 （競馬）
description.content:
Photo By スポニチ
「第５５回有馬記念」の優勝馬は果たして何か？熱血スポニチ予想陣が“緊急討論”を行った。ジャパンＣで無念の２着降着となった現役最強女王ブエナビスタの復権は！？ぶっつけ本番となった昨年の覇者ドリームジャーニーが、シンボリクリスエス（０２、０３年）以来、史上５頭目の連覇を飾るのか？はたまた、充実３歳陣による世代交代劇は？徹底的に語り合った内容をお届けする。
寺下 いよいよ有馬ですね。なんて、一番若い僕から切り出していいんですか！！初めて競馬場で見たのが０３年菊花賞。リンカーン２着の時。で、有馬も応援したんです。武豊が早めにまくり、４コーナーで先頭に立った時は興奮しましたよ。シンボリクリスエスにちぎられて２着だったんですが…。馬券的にはマツリダゴッホ。スポニチでアルバイトしてましたが、ホクホクでした。
鈴木 ハイ、その話はカットで。僕の有馬の思い出は競馬記者になった後の０４年ゼンノロブロイ。藤沢和先生は「お馬さんが頑張ったから」とまず記念撮影に並ばないんですが、あの時は入って。「ちょっとうれしかったからね」と。凄く印象的です。
岡本 「人脈」っぽい話だな。僕は学生の時。京都から普通電車を乗り継いで、中山に向かったけど、持っていたスポーツ紙に「前売り入場券を持ってないと入場できません」と書いてあって。泣く泣くウインズ横浜へ。何が勝ったかも覚えてない。
万哲 あの頃は馬券を買うにも、かなり並んだもんね。自分は有馬はトンと縁がないから思い出話はこの辺で。
鳥谷越 基本的には得意レースなんです。天皇賞→ジャパンＣと戦ってきて、成績的にもかなり絞れるというか軸馬を決めやすい。今年はまずはブエナビスタでしょう。天皇賞も、降着になったといえ、ジャパンＣも圧倒的強さだった。１番人気は確実でしょうけど、歴代有馬優勝馬と比べても、何ら見劣りしない有力候補だと思う。
岡本 ブエナは確かに強い！！先週、栗東で騎手に聞いたら、みんな「ブエナでしょう」と言うんだ。それに「日本人騎手だったら、あんなむちゃな騎乗はしないからＪＣも勝っていた」とこれも複数騎手が。この秋に関しては崩れていないし…。だけど◎を打つかとなると。
浜田 実はブエナには気になる点もあるんですよ。ジャパンＣのゴール前は苦しがっているように見えたし、乗り方もあるのかもしれないけど何度も手前を替えていた。天皇賞→ジャパンＣと見た目には楽勝に見えたけど、見えない疲れが出てないか？
万哲 関東馬ならともかく、関西馬だと栗東〜関東競馬場の長距離輸送の連続…。この秋、３度目の輸送もつらいよね。
浜田 確かに。昨年、ジャパンＣを勝ったウオッカは鼻出血を発症するほどの過酷なレースだったし、ダイワスカーレットは有馬（０８年）を勝ったけどジャパンＣをパスして挑んだ。そう考えると、天皇賞→ジャパンＣ→有馬記念の王道３戦は牝馬にはかなり過酷。宝塚記念で２着に敗れた時も、ドバイ遠征からの見えない蓄積疲労がないとも言えなかった。これまでの成績から３着を外すとは思えないけど、東京よりも中山向きとは言いにくいし、何かに脚をすくわれる危険はあるのでは。
[ 2010年12月22日 07:41 ]

description.hltext_display: Butternut nips Bayfield in OT
description.content:
11:57 PM CST
BUTTERNUT — After rallying to force overtime, the Butternut Midgets turned up their defense to notch a 55-51 win over the Bayfield Trollers in their Indianhead Conference girls basketball game Tuesday night.
Butternut led 19-13 after one quarter only to see the Trollers come back for a 25-24 halftime edge. After three quarters, it was 40-37 Midgets, but Bayfield came back and held a 49-48 lead as time wound down.

description.hltext_display: Rock and roll kicks off library’s cultural series
description.content:
Topics for First Tuesday programs include 2010 book about Forest Grove
“Roots of Rock,” a program featuring rock and roll music from the 1950s through the 1980s will kick off the Friends of the Forest Grove Library’s First Tuesday Cultural Series on Tuesday, Jan. 4 at 7 p.m.
Presented by the Hillsboro and Beaverton-based band SNAX, the program will consist of a selection of famous rock and roll hits from across several decades.
Special programs will be held the first Tuesday of each month from January through May, 2011.
Future events include:
Feb. 1: Earthquake and Tsunami Threats in Oregon, presented by Dr. James Roddey of the Oregon Department of Geology.
March 1: Images of historic Forest Grove, from the 2010 book, “Images of America: Forest Grove,” by Lisa Amato and Mary Jo Morelli. Copies of the book will be on sale following the presentation.
April 5: “Massacred for Gold: the Story of the Chinese Miners in Hell’s Canyon.” Author Greg Nokes will speak about his book, which documents this disturbing incident in Oregon’s frontier history.
May 3: Music by Gentle Rain Jazz, which plays soothing vocal and instrumental music.
For more information about the free programs, call Dave Pauli, Hillsboro Public Libraries reference librarian, at 503-380-1583.

description.hltext_display: Cirielli: "Mara ha un accordo con De Luca"
description.content:
Il presidente della Provincia accusa la collega di partito e ministro alle Pari opportunità. Non lesina critiche neanche al governo, reo di aver cambiato il decreto rifiuti imponendo la nomina di un commissario per il termovalorizzatore
• «Devo pensare che c’è un accordo politico tra Mara Carfagna e De Luca, per fargli vincere le elezioni a Salerno». Edmondo Cirielli alza il tiro della polemica, e dagli studi di Telecolore spara ad alzo zero sul ministro alle Pari opportunitá.
• Non solo. Il presidente della Provincia chiede alla magistratura di aprire un’inchiesta sugli espropri eseguiti dal Comune nell’area destinata al termovalorizzatore; e in una nota diffusa nel pomeriggio si dice «molto critico nei confronti del Governo», a cui rimprovera di non avere ancora erogato i fondi annunciati dopo l’a lluvione e di sottrarre alla Provincia le competenze sull’i nceneritore. L’ultima versione del decreto rifiuti, che trasforma da facoltá in obbligo la nomina di un commissario per accelerare l’i ter sull’impianto, è il nucleo dello scontro con la Carfagna e delle frizioni con l’esecutivo.Cirielli prevede che il decreto sará ancora modificato e smentisce le voci di una sua uscita dal Pdl per aderire ai finiani, ma si dichiara «amareggiato con il partito» e dice di aver subìto «un’autentica prepotenza». «Il Governo - spiega - prima mi ha attribuito competenze sul termovalorizzatore e poi, con un’azione piratesca del ministro all’ambiente, cerca di sottrarmele nonostante abbia dimostrato in pochi mesi di aver ottemperato ai miei doveri, a differenza di quanto fatto dal sindaco. Il punto è che Carfagna e Prestigiacomo sono della stessa corrente, e il ministro all’ambiente ha voluto fare un favore all’a michetta».
• L’attacco alla Carfagna è frontale:«Non si occupa di niente che riguardi Salerno, sa solo dire che il Comune è più bravo della Provincia. Sui fondi per i danni dell’alluvione andrò io a insistere con il Governo, sebbene dovrebbe farlo lei».Le attribuisce le responsabilitá degli screzi con l’esecutivo e con i vertici del Pdl, spiegando di essere «in contrasto con il mio partito anche per la prepotenza del ministro Carfagna, in combutta con l’onorevole Bocchino e il sindaco De Luca». Ma precisa: «Non ho mai pensato di tradire il progetto politico di Berlusconi e, se dovessi cambiare idea su di lui, coerentemente di mi dimetterei prima da deputato piuttosto che passare in Futuro e libertá». In attesa del decreto, chiede che sull’inceneritore si muova la Procura, indagando sui prezzi degli espropri: «Sono certo che lo fará, non voglio credere che la magistratura possa servire una parte».

description.hltext_display: Population surge gives Texas 4 new US House seats
description.author: JAY ROOT
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas Texas is gaining more congressional seats than any other state, and a partisan fight now looms over where the new seats should go. AP Photo
Census Bureau Director Robert Groves announces results for the 2010 U.S. Census at the National Press Club, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010 in Washington.
View larger
http://www.census.gov New population figures from the U.S. Census Bureau gave Texas four new U.S. House seats. Florida is the only other state with multiple pickups, getting two.
Democrats say most of the gains in Texas came from a surge in Hispanic and black residents, constituencies that traditionally support Democrats. But Texas Republicans, who control the Legislature and the redistricting process, have made recent strides in winning Hispanic support.
All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census. The survey found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
Have the CDT delivered to your home. . Get the TV Book delivered to your home. .

description.hltext_display: Bus Fare Increments Are Unreasonable
description.content:
-It's not fair that the public transport authorities should fold their hands while bus companies fleece their customers of their hard earned cash in the name of holiday spirit.
Buses carrying passengers that used to charge Ush15000 to Mbarara now charge Ush20000, and for the case of Kalita bus service that plies Fort portal Kampala route, passengers now part with Ush35000, twice what they used to pay two weeks ago.
Those boarding buses from Qualicel Bus Terminal to Rukungiri are paying Shs25,000 up from Shs20,000. Buses that load from Uganda Bus Terminal to Rukungiri have doubled the transport dues from Shs15,000 to Shs30,000.
Operators to Jinja, Busia and Mbale are waiting for Christmas Day to draw close to increase the fares. My hope is that Ms Suzan Kataike, the spokesperson for the Ministry of Works, Transport and Communications will put a permanent stop to this nonsense.

event_or_fact.property: Ministry of Works, Transport and Communications

entity.property: Ministry of Works, Transport and Communications

description.hltext_display: Las ventas del sorteo se mantienen en los mismos niveles que el año anterior, cerca de 2.700 millones
description.content:
Las ventas del sorteo de Navidad se han mantenido relativamente estables respecto al año pasado, con una caída del 0,2% hasta cerca de los 2.700 millones de euros, según ha adelantado el director general de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), Gonzalo Fernández .
Fernández ha subrayado en una entrevista a TVE recogida por Europa Press que, teniendo en cuenta que el año pasado las ventas cayeron un 3% en relación con 2008 y la actual "situación económica" de España, la caída del 0,2% de 2010 puede ser entendida como "una remontada, un inicio de cambio de ciclo".
Por otro lado, sobre la entrada de capital privado en LAE, anunciada por el Gobierno de José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero , Fernández ha comparado la situación de LAE con la de otras empresas españolas hace años y ha afirmado que tiene "la visión" de que, en un plazo de cinco a diez años, Loterías y Apuestas del Estado se convertirá en "una gran empresa en el mundo internacional en el juego".
El máximo responsable de LAE ha agradecido a la red de ventas el trabajo que han realizado en este Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad , que este año ha tenido "un alto nivel de exigencia" debido a los cambios introducidos "que complican un poco más el quehacer", como la nueva sede o el hecho de que los premios mayores se puedan recoger al día siguiente en lugar de a los nueve días, como era tradicional.
Fernández ha deseado a todos los que participan " que sean afortunados en el reparto de premios y especialmente en el gordo ". Sobre el propio sorteo, ha indicado que se trata de "un rito más que si no se produce no tienes la Navidad completa" como ocurre con la compra de los turrones o el cava.
Mientras, el director de comercial de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado, Juan Antonio Gallardo López , también ha agradecido la labor de la red de ventas y de las más de cien personas que participan en la jornada del miércoles en el sorteo.

description.hltext_display: Giovanni Arveneh verlässt den "Marienhof"
description.content: Mit seinem Ausstieg geht eine Ära zu Ende: Nach 16 Jahren verlässt Schauspieler Giovanni Arveneh die ARD- Soap " Marienhof". description.hltext_display: Fini buonista: niente guerra a Berlusconi
description.content:
"Basta con la contrapposizione Fini-Berlusconi, ora cerchiamo di lavorare sul piano dei contenuti e delle proposte concrete". Nonostante la febbre a 39 e l'aereo che lo aspetta per il Kosovo, Gianfranco Fini cerca di motivare le truppe di Fli nella cena a FareFuturo per gli auguri natalizi
"Basta con la contrapposizione Fini-Berlusconi, ora cerchiamo di lavorare sul piano dei contenuti e delle proposte concrete". Nonostante la febbre a 39 e l'aereo che lo aspetta per il Kosovo, Gianfranco Fini cerca di motivare le truppe di Fli nella cena a FareFuturo per gli auguri natalizi.
E' finita una fase, si deve andare avanti e costruire. E' cosi' che il leader Fli la vede, ed è per questo che certo non risponde con toni polemici a Silvio Berlusconi, che ha appena definito "incredibile" il fatto che Fini sia passato dal presentare una mozione di sfiducia al dire oggi che la legislatura deve andare avanti.
A chi è smarrito per l'accelerazione brusca verso il terzo polo, Fini spiega che "il polo nuovo non è un partito e ancora nemmeno un cartello elettorale, ma un coordinamento di parlamentari, tutti provenienti da forze di opposizione, molte delle quali provengono da esperienze di governo con Berlusconi".
"Ora saremo uno stimolo per il governo - afferma Fini - perché l'opinione pubblica ha capito la nostra insofferenza per Berlusconi ma non capirebbe un'opposizione pregiudiziale. La nostra sarà un'opposizione responsabile. A gennaio si riunirà l'assemblea dei parlamentari del Partito di responsabilità nazionale e decideremo di volta in volta come agire".
Si gira pagina dunque, nella convinzione che "in Parlamento c'è una maggioranza risicata e monca di Fli, quindi sbaglia chi crede che la scelta dei finiani li abbia marginalizzati". Fini invita però tutti a prendersi una pausa di riflessione: "Dal 22 dicembre al 10 gennaio state tutti un po' zitti - li esorta - fate belle vacanze e lasciate che siano altri a parlare". E in seguito attenzione alle trappole: "Sui temi etici non facciamo errori, non cadiamo nelle trappole strumentali di chi cerca di dividerci, perché questi sono temi che da che mondo è mondo non rientrano nei programmi di governo e dei partiti".
"Sullo sfondo resta il congresso da preparare per l'11-12-13 febbraio a Milano. Pochi messaggi e chiari - dà le direttive Fini - e dopo la pausa natalizia mettiamoci al lavoro per far capire agli italiani cosa vogliamo. Da voi ho sentito a volte idee interessanti, ma a volte anche strampalate". Si costituirà una commissione per un decalogo politico-programmatico, una commissione per lo statuto e Fli si darà regole organizzative. "Ma basta con i colonnelli - conclude Fini - sono una patologia del passato".

【有馬記念水曜追い】ドリジャニに太鼓判「いい追い切り」 （競馬）
description.content:
昨年の覇者ドリームジャーニー（牡６＝池江寿）は池添が騎乗して坂路単走追い。４Ｆ５２秒１−１２秒６でしっかり伸びてきた。池江寿師は「いい追い切りができました。久々ですけど使い込んでいるときと変わらない感じ。とにかく、この馬の力を引き出すだけ」と力をこめた。 【有馬記念】
[ 2010年12月22日 10:24 ]

description.hltext_display: El Ibex 35 arranca plano en los 10.200 puntos
description.content:
Los indicadores europeos afrontan sus niveles más altos desde mayo de 2008, aunque otras bolsas, como la española, acumulan una caída este año del 14% . Entre las mejores, la alemana, que está a punto de cerrar el ejercicio con una subida del 20%.
Con sólo seis sesiones para despedir el año, los inversores se pregunta si aún queda margen para seguir subiendo en lo que queda de mes, aunque lo cierto es que el rally ya se ha producido, registrando un alza del 10%. Ni el aviso de Moody's a Portugal ni la nueva escalada de la prima de riesgo hasta los 260 puntos pudieron frenar al Ibex 35 ayer que consiguió recuperar la cota de los 10.200 puntos.
En esta sesión, el Ibex 35 ha comenzado plano en los 10.200 puntos. BME , Telecinco y Ebro Foods lideran las subidas aunque en ningún caso superan el 1%. Acciona , Inditex y Bankinter ocupan el lado opuesto de la balanza con recortes que rondan el 0,5%. Datos económicos Sin duda la principal referencia vendrá desde EE UU. Las cifras revisadas del PIB del tercer trimestre del año toman el protagonismo de la jornada. Sin salir de Wall Street , los inversores también tendrán en cuenta la venta de viviendas de segunda mano de noviembre. A este lado del Atlántico, la entrada de turistas en nuestro país y las cifras de crecimiento económico en Reino Unido completan el cuadro macroeconómico. Empresas BME ha pagado hoy entre sus accionistas un dividendo bruto de 0,6 euros por acción.
Por otro lado, ACS ha comunicado que a día de ayer posee el 27,26% de los derechos de voto de Hochtief. Hasta esa fecha habían acudido 5.825 acciones a su oferta de compra.
La unidad de energía solar de Abengoa ha obtenido un préstamo de 1.450 millones de dólares y un préstamo garantizado del gobierno de EE.UU. para construir una planta de energía solar-térmica de 250 megavatios en Arizona planta de energía solar-térmica.
Abertis estudia vender su participación en la italiana Atlantia y la portuguesa Brisa para financiar las inversiones futuras, según publican medios digitales, citando palabras de Francisco Reynés, director ejecutivo de la empresa. Abertis tiene una participación del 6.7% en Atlantia y una participación del 14.58% en Brisa. La inversión de Abertis en Italia tiene un valor de 607,5 millones de euros, mientras que su participación en Brisa vale unos 471 millones de euros.

description.hltext_display: Berlusconi: se la Consulta dirà no a legittimo impedimento, farò vergognare i pm
description.content:
"Io continuero' a governare, ma mi difendero', stavolta scendendo direttamente in piazza e raccontera' a tutti gli italiani qual e' la vicenda di cui si tratta, chi sono i giudici che se ne occupano e per cio' non temo assolutamente questo fatto". Lo ha detto Silvio Berlusconi a Matrix, riferendosi alla sentenza della Consulta sul legittimo impedimento. "Siccome non ho fatto nulla non penso possa esserci una sentenza negativa - ha aggiunto - senno' scendero' in campo partecipando ai processi, ma anche andando in tv e sui giornali e faro' vergognare i miei accusatori".
"Io vita facile? Non direi proprio. Se avessi vita facile non dovrei lavorare 18 ore al giorno, fare 20 telefonate, tanti incontri e poi subire tutte le calunnie e le menzogne che ogni giorno mi tirano addosso". Cosi' Silvio Berlusconi, durante la registrazione di Matrix, risponde alla domanda se e' vero che ha vita facile in quanto non ci solo alternative a sinistra. Infine Berlusconi torna anche a criticare le trasmissioni della Rai, in particolare di Raitre: "Mi sono preso un virus e sono stato a letto con 39 di febbre per un giorno e mezzo e ho avuto la malaugurata idea di guardare la televisione. Ho visto nell'ordine il Tg3, Ballaro', Parla con me e Linea notte... Poi sono andato in bagno, mi sono guardato allo specchio e mi sono sentito come un criminale".
NUOVO NOME
Il Pdl non intende cambiare nome, ma nel caso di elezioni anticipate lo fara' per tutelarsi contro eventuali ricorsi da parte di Fli. Lo dice il presidente del Consiglio, Silvio Berlusconi, annunciando di avere "gia' in mente il nuovo nome: sara' - ha detto il premier a Matrix - probabilmente di una parola sola". 'Si chiamera' Silvio?', chiede con una battuta il conduttore. "Magari... - e' la risposta ironica di Berlusconi - ma io sono contro i personalismi in politica". Berlusconi ha premesso, rispondendo alla domanda sul cambio di nome, che "da un lato l'acronimo non commuove e non emoziona, Forza Italia era Forza Italia, ma non vogliamo tornare indietro perche' Fli e' alle nostre spalle mentre il Pdl e' stato voluto dalla gente piu' che da noi quindi andremo avanti. Un pericolo pero' continua Berlusconi - incombe sul nome: il Fli potrebbe avanzare la volonta' di appropriarsi del nome e fare ricorso e visto come si sono comportati i giudici in altre occasioni meglio tutelarsi". Quindi, conclude Berlusconi, "si pensa ad un nuovo nome in caso di elezioni, un nome che ho gia' in mente ma che non dico perche' prima dobbiamo depositarlo: probabilmente sara' di una parola sola".
WIKILEAKS
I file di Wikileaks "hanno fatto molto male all'immagine degli Stati Uniti nel mondo e ha creato molte antipatie e risentimenti tra i vari paesi che non e' una cosa positiva". Lo ha detto Silvio Berlusconi intervenendo a Matrix. Berlusconi ha ribadito che i rapporti tra Italia e Usa "non sono cambiati affatto, sono sempre stati ottimi, come ha detto il segretario di Stato Clinton a caldo".
"I SALVATORI" I parlamentari che sono passati con la maggioranza, non avranno posti nel governo nel caso in cui si dovesse formare un nuovo esecutivo. Lo dice Silvio Berlusconi durante la registrazone di Matrix. "Non ci sara' questa eventualita', ha detto Berlusconi ribadendo che "non c'e' stato alcun calcio mercato: Il calcio mercato lo escludo - ha aggiunto - ne' compravendita ne' e' stato promesso a qualcuno una posizione di governo. Non l'abbiamo fatto per principio ne' l'abbiamo dovuto fare perche' chi ha preso una decisione lo ha fatto per un profondo convincimento". Per Berlusconi "e assurdo che quelli che dal centrodestra sono passati alla sinsitra hanno motivi eticamente validi, mentre le persone che hanno deciso di sostenere i moderati sono persone vili".
VOTO
Il rischio di elezioni anticipate non e' scongiurato, perche' "noi riteniamo di poter allargare la maggioranza, ma ove non riuscissimo in questa iniziativa non ci sarebbe che da tornare dal popolo sovrano". Lo dice Silvio Berlusconi a Matrix. Le elezioni "certamente - ha aggiunto - non farebbero bene al Paese perche' verrebbe fuori un governo meno decisivo e capace di governare. Spero poter continuare, stiamo lavorando per ampliare i numeri della maggioranza - ha ribadito Berlusconi - ma se questo non dovesse avvenire si andrebbe a votare".

description.hltext_display: Cloquet pulls away from AHS
description.content:
11:57 PM CST
The Ashland hockey team played excellent hockey for about 34 minutes Tuesday night against Lake Superior Conference foe Cloquet. But in the LSC, 34 minutes isn't good enough.
The Lumberjacks opened up a close game late in the second period, and they broke things open in the third en route to an 11-1 victory at the BACC.

description.content:
STOCKHOLM (Direkt) Semcon har utsetts till så kallad
A-leverantör av Vattenfall för åren 2011-2013 med option på
ytterligare ett år.
Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande.
Avtalet gäller tekniska konsulttjänster inom
kärnkraft, vindkraft och vattenkraft.
Att bli utsedd till A-leverantör innebär att Semcon
hör till de prioriterade leverantörerna hos kraftbolaget.
Avtalet ger möjligheter för Semcon att bredda och öka
försäljningen inom energiområdet, uppger Mats Körner,
affärsområdesansvarig för Design och Development på Semcon, i
pressmeddelandet.

description.hltext_display: Un cadavre sur la plage
description.author: Electra
description.content:
Une découverte aussi inhabituelle que macabre et mystérieuse a été faite hier, sur la plage du Havre, du côté du boulevard Clemenceau. Un employé municipal aurait donné l'alerte en voyant sur les galets, vers 10 heures, près de la digue nord, une partie d'un corps en état de décomposition avancée. « Un corps humain », assurait la police dans la journée, avant de préciser qu'il s'agissait d'un tronc et d'une partie des membres inférieurs.
Dans l'attente d'un examen en lire plus

description.hltext_display: La sfida di Cirielli: «A giugno la nuova Regione d’Arechi»
description.content:
Delusione nei confronti del Governo per la mancanza di aiuti dopo il maltempo. La sfida del referendum: «Sará la battaglia più importante della mia vita politica». E aggiunge: «Sul caso Carfagna aspetto risposte dal partito»
• Per il 2001 Edmondo Cirielli ha un obiettivo su tutti: costituire la regione autonoma di Salerno.Lo ha ribadito ieri, tracciando la road map del prossimo anno e annunciando per giugno l’appuntamento con il referendum. «Sará la battaglia più importante della mia vita politica» ha detto il presidente della Provincia. Una battaglia diventata più concreta qualche giorno fa, quando è stato consegnato in Cassazione un pacchetto di delibere comunali sufficiente ad attivare la procedura referendaria.«Quando parlavamo di Nuova Regione, a Napoli prima ridevano - chiosa Cirielli - Adesso stanno ridendo un po’ meno. Non possiamo tollerare che la Regione ci derubi di cento milioni di euro all’anno, restituendoci molto meno di quanto diamo con il pagamento delle tasse». Che fa sul serio lo manda a dire anche al Governo, a cui rimprovera di non avere erogato fondi per i danni provocati dal maltempo nel territorio salernitano:«Parliamo di 150 milioni solo per le opere viarie, un disastro economico davanti al quale non abbiamo ancora avuto risposte. Siamo delusi e inquieti, aspettiamo dal Governo provvedimenti adeguati».
Una reazione Cirielli l’attende anche dai vertici del partito, a cui è tornato a sottoporre le frizioni con Mara Carfagna: «Ho fatto i miei passi e sono in attesa di risposta», commenta. Ribadendo che lo scontro intestino non basterá ad allontanarlo dal progetto berlusconiano e tantomeno ad avvicinarlo ai finiani, «alleati della sinistra che copre i delinquenti responsabili delle aggressioni ai poliziotti». In Fli immagina vede piuttosto il ministro Carfagna: «Lo sanno tutti, non v’è dubbio che prima o poi entrerá in Futuro e libertá. Certo, poi bisognerá vedere chi la vota». Lui le rimprovera soprattutto di stare favorendo il sindaco De Luca nella rielaborazione del decreto rifiuti:«Che tra loro vi sia un accordo politico mi pare evidente. Non si spiega diversamente che un ministro del Pdl faccia di tutto per restituire al sindaco le competenze sul termovalorizzatore, che il suo stesso Governo gli ha tolto.
Piuttosto avrebbe dovuto evidenziare i meriti della Provincia, che ha fatto molto meglio del Comune». Nell’intesa trasversale vede anche l’Udc: «L’accordo è con De Luca e De Mita - affonda - E fanno davvero un bel trio».

description.hltext_display: Broncos Mailbag: Steep Tebow in study of slinging
description.content:
/script if(requestedWidth 0)}
Denver Post sports writer Mike Klis posts his Broncos Mailbag each Tuesday during the 2010 NFL season. This installment the first since Tim Tebow's first NFL start posted instead on Wednesday.
Pose a Broncos- or NFL-related question for the Broncos Mailbag.
OK, finally we played some rookies, including Tim Tebow. Do you think it's a good idea to have Tebow throw the ball about 75 percent of the time next week and not run the ball himself, forcing him to practice and learn the difficult short- and medium-pass game, especially to the right side? He needs the experience for next year.
-- Dave C., Irvine, Calif.
Dave - I don't advocate 75 percent pass plays for Tebow, or any quarterback for that matter. But I think there should be at least one pass play with 1:02 left in the first half and the ball at the 29. There should be at least one pass play with a new possession and the ball backed up at the Broncos' 3-yard line one time, and 6-yard line on another.
I understand calling plays to protect the kid quarterback from mistakes. But those three possessions were examples of coaches getting in Tebow's way.
What are the play callers in Denver thinking? Josh McDaniels, Mike McCoy ... whoever. Why keep giving it to Lance Ball when he's not doing anything (it's not like he's a proven runner)? A few weeks back they kept trying to pass when Knowshon Moreno was hot on the ground. It's been happening all season. It just baffles me.
-- AK, Melbourne, Australia
AK - The Broncos should be congratulated for advancing their fans to the next stage of discontent. McDaniels is gone. Check. Tebow is the starting quarterback. Check. Rotten play calling? That never goes away.
I agree with the Broncos quarterback Tim Tebow checks his wristband for a play Sunday against the Raiders. In what was his first NFL start, Tebow attempted 16 passes. Dave from Irvine, Calif., would like to see that number spike in the two remaining games this season. (John Leyba, The Denver Post)people regarding McCoy's play calling Sunday at Oakland. Tebow is too much of a playmaker to not trust him in those three sequences I mentioned in the previous letter. Tebow is the type of quarterback where you almost wish the play would break down.
Remember that old line about how the only guy who could stop Michael Jordan was Dean Smith? That's what it felt like Sunday watching Tebow attack those high-risk situations with no-risk handoffs. I had not seen such conservative play calling since Mike Shanahan lost confidence in Jake Plummer during the 2006 season.
Since the Broncos have only six drafts picks, is it possible they might trade Kyle Orton for additional draft picks?
-- Gary, Waynesboro, Tenn.
Gary - It's way early for such speculation. The team hasn't even named its general manager or head coach yet. But since sports fans like to put the cart about 10 miles before the horse, I'll go there and say, yes, there is a possible scenario ahead where an Orton trade could happen.
This would only happen if, first, the Broncos' new GM and head coach are committed to Tebow as their starting quarterback in 2011. Again, let's back off a bit. Let's watch Tebow play in these final two games, against Houston and San Diego, before making such a leap.
But if Tebow is the guy, trading Orton would make some sense because the $8.8 million salary he is scheduled to make next season is a ton for a backup quarterback. It's a Submit a Question Pose your Broncos- or NFL-related question for Mike Klis. Browse the Broncos Mailbag archive. Read Mike Klis' most recent column. Find analysis, notes and buzz on the All Things Broncos blog. fair price, though, for a team that feels it's a competent quarterback away from playoff contention. Teams like Carolina, Arizona, Oakland, Washington (gasp!), Minnesota and San Francisco.
This would make Brady Quinn the Broncos' backup to Tebow. It might work. Not sure if it will, but it might.
Why do fans of bad teams want to change the quarterback first? The QB position is far down the list of the Broncos' problems, but the fans are chanting "play Tebow" and "draft a QB." Often, I'd bet, they are the same geniuses who wanted to play Tom Brandstater who, when last I looked, was on the practice squad of a team that was playing its third-string QB a few weeks back at about this time last year. Same here in Seattle, where the chants are for Charlie Whitehurst, who has shown little evidence of being a credible replacement for Matt Hasselbeck. What's this QB fixation about?
-- Curt, Renton, Wash.
Curt - We share the same thoughts. Why aren't people clamoring for Richard Quinn to fill in for Daniel Graham at tight end? Or Demaryius Thomas and Eric Decker to replace Eddie Royal and Jabar Gaffney at receiver? Or Darcel McBath to replace Renaldo Hill at safety? Always, it's the quarterback. In the Broncos' case, their quarterback, Orton, was one of their top three players, along with receiver Brandon Lloyd and cornerback Champ Bailey, through the first 11 games.
But also in the Broncos' case, Curt, they were losing and the won-loss record is attached to no other player but the quarterback. Plus, you have to admit there is something special about Tebow. The guy is riveting. In a season gone wrong, Tebow is the only reason to pay attention. And I do mean the only reason.
Mike - One of my two Christmas wishes has come true. Now for the second. What is the possibility of Jon "Chucky" Gruden assuming the reins in Denver? (PLEASE say it is so.)
-- Jim E., Casper
Jim - Gruden makes some sense because he does seem to love Tebow. He loves everybody, but I think he genuinely believes Tebow can be a consistent winning NFL quarterback. And two, Gruden does know how to build a winning franchise. He's proven.
There are two strikes against him, though. One, he'd be expensive. Remember, the Broncos will pay $6.7 million to Shanahan ($3.5 million) and Josh McDaniels ($3.2 million) next year and $3.7 million to McDaniels in 2012. So their next head coach has to accept a back-loaded deal. Which I'm sure Gruden would be amenable to if the job was right.
The second problem, though, is Gruden can command final-say authority on the draft and building a roster. He had such power in Tampa Bay. We know this because no GM in his right mind would have carried so many quarterbacks on the roster as Gruden did in his final two years in Tampa Bay.
The Broncos are getting away from the be-all coach structure so guys like Gruden and Bill Cowher should have been the first names eliminated from their list of coaching candidates.
What's the likelihood of Denver hiring Urban Meyer?
-- George Brown, Tampa, Fla.
George - A burned-out college coach? No way. Let's allow Meyer to spend at least two years away from coaching. Not one year; two years. Five years would be ideal. And then when his wife and kids get tired of him hanging around, and he gets so bored his stress level returns to normal, he can consider getting back in coaching at whatever level he wishes.
I am sick of people saying the Broncos are in rebuilding mode. They are NOT. We have just had bad luck. I think people need to look at the bigger picture and look at the number of players coming back healthy next year: Dumervil, Ayers, White, Goodman and a healthier Moreno, Demaryius and Clady. With a fortified defense through the draft and smarter play calling, I envision a playoff spot. What do you think?
-- Ahmad Jaffery, Omaha
Ahmad - It took me a good 12 seconds to figure who White was. LenDale White. When it comes to the NFL, even hometown heroes become out of mind when they've been out of sight.
Anyway, you make good points, Ahmad. It's my belief the Broncos aren't as far away from playoff contention as their record this year indicates.
One reason McDaniels is out of a job right now is he didn't prioritize the importance of getting his players to the starting line. Elvis Dumervil suffered a season-ending injury during the second of a two-a-day, full-pads practice in training camp. Right tackle Ryan Harris suffered a severe ankle injury while playing in the fourth preseason game. I agree with McDaniels' concept of bringing a physical toughness to the Broncos. This franchise was too soft for too long. But there's a fine line between beating toughness into players and beating them down.
The injury to Doom indeed Doomed the Broncos' season before it could start. He's that valuable. There was no replacing his 17 sacks. And there was no Broncos pass rush this year.
A healthy Dumervil, coupled with either using the No. 2 or No. 3 overall draft pick on Clemson defensive end Da'Quan Bowers or trading down a few spots to take a defensive linemen with, say, the No. 6-10 pick, and picking up a safety or offensive tackle with an additional second-round pick and the Broncos (regardless of whether Orton or Tebow is their quarterback) can dramatically improve next season.
Hey, Mike. Like everyone else, I think it was the right move to take Josh McDaniels down from head coach, but why not just make him an offensive coordinator or QB trainer and let him work on Tebow and get a pay cut instead of Pat paying him for nothing next year?
-- Stefan Ralle, Odense, Denmark
Stefan - That's not the way it works in the NFL. Too many egos involved. Your proposal may happen in the military or the downtown office. But that would not be a good career move for McDaniels. And his association with the video scandal would not make it a good business move for the Broncos, who are trying to regain trust and confidence from their fan base.
Let's cut to the chase. Name Marty Schottenheimer GM. Go get June Jones from SMU to return the Broncos to the days of tough defense and a wide-open, Elway-esque, big-scoring-machine offense. Marty has division experience aplenty from his K.C. and S.D. days, and June has done two fantastic jobs at both Hawaii and SMU of building from a zero start. Look them both over: two big winners and John Elway to boot! What a combo.
-- Mike Doak, Carlsbad, Calif.
Mike - Your idea is a little out there, but I like parts of it. I love Marty as a head coach. I'm not a big June Jones' guy, but I could see him coordinating his offense with Tebow. The Broncos could do worse than hire a couple of retreads.
But here's how it appears the Broncos will go at season's end: John Elway will join the front office with a title like "director of football operations." He will oversee the football department. Brian Xanders will be the general manager who makes the draft picks and sets the roster. On the big decisions, like who to take with the No. 1-4 overall draft pick, Xanders and Elway will collaborate. The head coach will come down to the gut of Broncos owner Pat Bowlen with influence from chief operating officer Joe Ellis, Xanders (whose research will probably help set the list of candidates) and maybe Elway.
The most exciting head coaching hire the Broncos can make is Jim Harbaugh, who is currently at Stanford. A more solid choice would be Leslie Frazier, the Minnesota Vikings' defensive coordinator and interim head coach. But I'd be surprised if the Vikings don't quickly remove the "interim" label from Frazier's title.
Bowlen prefers offensive-minded head coaches. He likes offensive minds because he likes his team to have star power at quarterback. He's not a stout-defense/run-the-ball kind of owner. It's a sound, core philosophy. Football franchises are about winning, first, but they're also about entertainment.
I do believe Bowlen needs to adjust his thinking a tad and understand a big reason why the Broncos have not reached the Super Bowl in (going on) 12 seasons is because they haven't had very good defenses.
Andrew Luck is the updated version of John Elway. How about packaging draft picks to move up to get him, and hire his college coach Jim Harbaugh as well?
-- Ken Wikler, Oregon
Ken - Like Andrew Luck. Like Jim Harbaugh. Don't like the Broncos taking Andrew Luck. As it is, the Broncos have a crowded and talented quarterback stable with Tebow perhaps getting the first chance to lead the team, Orton either competing for the job or becoming an $8.8 million backup, and Quinn still under contract for one more year.
Taking a quarterback in the first round of back-to-back drafts would be almost as ill advised as the Detroit Lions taking receivers with top 10 picks four out of five years from 2003-2007. There's just too many other needs. The Broncos need defensive players.
Mike Klis is in his sixth season of covering the Broncos for The Denver Post. He previously covered the Rockies and Major League Baseball for 15 years. Pose a Broncos- or NFL-related question for the Broncos Mailbag. Listen to Mike Klis on "Klis' Korner" each weekday on 87.7 FM The Ticket.

description.hltext_display: Manifestons sous la pluie !
description.author: admin
description.content: C'est sous la pluie que s'est formé, pour la dernière fois cette année, un cercle de silence près de l'Espace Coty. Car, quand on défend des idées, c'est par tous les temps et la météo importe peu. Les personnes présentes, membres de divers groupes, associations, partis et Eglises, voulaient, une fois encore, attirer l'attention sur les situations difficiles et parfois dramatiques que vivent des étrangers confrontés aux refus de titres de séjour, à l'enfermement dans des centres de rétention et aux expulsions. en lire plus

description.hltext_display: Želja “večitih”, reprezentativac Mirić, ide u inostranstvo
description.content:
Vezni igrač Spartaka pred selidbom
D. Nikolić | 22. 12. 2010. - 09:12h | Foto: M. Metlaš | Komentara: 0
Vezni igrač subotičkog Spartaka Mаrko Mirić, koji je za reprezentaciju Srbije debitovao u prijateljskom meču sa Bugarskom, po svoj prilici neće se preseliti u Beograd gde su ga poželela naša dva najpopularnija kluba.
“Pаrtizаn je trenutno nаjuspešniji srpski klub, prаtilа je Mirićа i Crvenа zvezdа, аli čini mi se dа večiti nemаju novаc dа gа аngаžuju. Usmerili su finаnsije nа drugu strаnu, dovode pojаčаnjа iz Brаzilа, а u nаšu decu bаš i nisu spremni dа ulаžu”, rekao je za “Sportski žurnal” Dušan Odžаklić, potpredsednik Spartaka.
On je dodao da Mirića u svojim redovima želi i Keln.
“Interesuju se po jedаn rumunski, turski i holаndski klub, а jаvili su se i ljudi iz Kelnа. Nаjkаsnije zа deset dаnа procenićemo štа je nаjbolje rešenje, jer će tаj potez u znаčаjnoj meri odrediti nаše plаnove u jаnuаrskom prelаznom roku”, rekao je Odžaklić.

description.hltext_display: El Gobierno checo supera una cuestión de confianza
description.content:
La medida fue frenada gracias al apoyo de las dos formaciones que integran la coalición de Gobierno -Partido de Asuntos Públicos y TOP09- junto al Partido Cívico Democrático , que obtuvo la mayoría de los votos en las elecciones del pasado mes de mayo, aunque no la suficiente como para gobernar en solitario.
"Estoy convencido de que después del nuevo año la coalición de Gobierno primará los acuerdos sobre los asuntos clave que nos ocupan", dijo Necas tras superar la cuestión, en referencia a los tres temas que prometió impulsar a su llegada al Ejecutivo: reformas en ámbitos clave de la administración, una estrategia clara contra la corrupción y la estabilización de la economía.
Horas antes de la votación, los líderes de las tres formaciones se reunieron con el presidente checo, Vaclav Klaus , para sellar un acuerdo de mínimos que les permitiera continuar en el poder. Aunque los detalles de este pacto no han trascendido, el dirigente adelantó que incluye una hoja de ruta clara para erradicar la corrupción de la administración pública.
"Es un acuerdo muy básico sobre cómo manejar esta situación en los próximos días y semanas", reveló Klaus, en alusión al escándalo del titular de Medio Ambiente , que ha hecho peligrar la gobernabilidad del país, ya que Asuntos Públicos amenazó con retirar su apoyo a Necas si no fuerza la renuncia de Drobil, algo sobre lo que el primer ministro todavía guarda silencio.

description.hltext_display: Pastena, sigilli al "tesoro" di Marco Vicinanza
description.content:
Applicata la normativa antimafia. Eseguito il sequestro preventivo dell’outlet di Pastena. La magistratura mette sotto chiave beni per 170mila euro. Il trentunenne salernitano fu arrestato nel 2007 perché ritenuto affiliato al clan "Papacchione"
• Ammonta a 170mila euro il valore del patrimonio preventivamente sequestrato a Marco Vicinanza, 31enne salernitano condannato, con sentenze di primo grado, per detenzione al fine di spaccio di stupefacenti nonché per il delitto di associazione di tipo mafioso collegata con attivitá inerenti al traffico di droga.
• A far scattare i sigilli, nella mattinata di ieri, gli uomini della divisione "Anticrimine" della questura, diretti da Raffaele Battista. Nel mirino sono finiti un noto outlet situato tra via Sichelmanno e via Amendola, a Pastena, la merce esposta in vendita, un conto corrente bancario sul quale erano depositati 65mila euro, un maxiscooter Piaggio Beverly 500 ed un motociclo scooter Piaggio Beverly 200. Il sequestro precauzionale è stato disposto dal giudice AntonioCentore della sezione delle misure di prevenzione del tribunale. Gli inquirenti hanno applicato preventivamente nei confronti di Vicinanza la normativa antimafia del 1965, ritenendo che i beni sequestrati, pur se intestati formalmente al padre ed al fratello, continuassero ad essere nelle sue disponibilitá.
• L’outlet, dopo una iniziale cessazione di attivitá da parte del 31enne, risulta infatti intestato a suo fratello, mentre il conto corrente, è stato aperto presso un istituto di credito salernitano a nome del padre. Nel mirino del tribunale, giá da qualche tempo, era finita una movimentazione di denaro ritenuta sospetta.
• Vicinanza, ad ottobre 2007, finì in manette insieme ad altre undici persone - tra cui Giuseppe Stellato, Fabio Iavarone e Mimmo Marigliano - con l’accusa di fare parte del clan "Papacchione". Il blitz di polizia e carabinieri sgominò infatti il gruppo dei "ragazzi di Pastena", Stellato da una parte e Iavarone dall’altra, che avevano costituito gruppi malavitosi grazie alla mediazione di Marigliano, fratello del boss Ciro (esponente di spicco del clan D’A gostino). L’obiettivo era quello di unirsi per mettere sotto torchio, attraverso una vera e propria strategia del terrore consumata a colpi di rapine ed estorsioni, oltre che con il traffico di stupefacenti, gli operatori della "movida" ed i titolari di diversi esercizi commerciali cittadini. Il mercato di via Robertelli, il mercato ittico, la rapina alla filiale del "Ruggi" del Monte Paschi (evitata dai carabinieri), il pestaggio di due vigilantes e il tentato omicidio di un poliziotto nel locale notturno "Federica", sono solo alcuni degli episodi che furono contestati al gruppo.

description.hltext_display: US poised to approve nuclear arms pact with Russia
description.author: DESMOND BUTLER
description.content:
WASHINGTON The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority. AP Photo
Sen. John Kerry, D-Mass., left, and Sen. Richard Lugar, R-Ind., right, talk during a news conference about the New START Treaty on Capitol Hill in Washington Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010.
View larger Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'"
Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.
Have the CDT delivered to your home. . Get the TV Book delivered to your home. .

description.hltext_display: Genesis launch new Latitude 853 frame
description.content:
Brand new Reynolds 853 hardtail frame revealed
All-new Latitude 853 for 2011
Genesis Bikes has just sent us news of its all-new Latitude 853 frame for 2011.
For the 2011 853 frames, the brand has worked extensively with Reynolds on a unique tubeset that is strong enough to handle 140mm travel forks without gusseting – it passed the CEN test by a margin of more than twice the test cycles as did the previous 853 frame, but without gussets and with a more refined, comfortable overall frame feel.
The new frame uses Reynolds 853 DZB (Dual Zone Butting) triple butted tubes – both top and down tube use additional wall thickness in the area close to the head tube to increase fatigue strength over the previous tubes. AS such they've been able to use slimmer tube sections as well as a bit less material overall in the rest of the tubes to add strength without adding the weight of gussets or larger tubes. The seat tube is 631 which allows a 631 headtube at no extra cost, keeping strength high where it's needed most.
With tapered steerer forks becoming more common, the designers opted for a 44mm ID headtube made from Reynolds 631, unique to Genesis. With this added durability at the front of the bike, they've been able to keep the downtube diameter the same as the previous frame but the top tube has been made wider in the horizontal plane (a flatter section in the front half that tapers and reduces to a 28.6mm round section at the seat tube), for increased lateral stiffness.
Asymmetric chainstays with a 'plate design' makes for increased clearance for mud and 2x10 chainsets alike.The chain and seat stays are now heat-treated Cr-Mo so we’ve added strength to the chainstays and reduced the diameter of the seatstays to add compliance and work with the slimmer rear section of the top tube.
The 853 Latitude is also now coated internally to avoid rust, as well as having a replaceable gear hanger. The geometry has had a minor revision that works even better with the new generation of 120mm forks. The head angle is just ½ degree slacker than before and the front centre is around 0.5in longer. "It’s a subtle change, but one that’s made quite a difference to the overall feel of the bike when combined with the tube changes we’ve made. All-in-all, the frame is riding better than we imagined," commented Genesis.
Available now at £399.99 RRP frame only, or a complete bike at £1599.99. Find out more at www.genesisbikes.co.uk

description.hltext_display: The Viking Log Underground meets with kudos
description.content:
Printer-friendly version Email story link
Student-produced paper prints first issue same week as FGHS’ The Forest
The first issue of The Viking Log Underground, an independent newspaper produced by Forest Grove High School students, published last week to rave reviews.
Editor-in-chief Jordan Meyers, who is leading a staff of 15 at The VLU as his senior project, said he handed out dozens of copies of the eight-page maiden edition on campus Friday.
“The comments have been endless,” Meyers said. “Teachers have used words like ‘incredibly great work’ and ‘fantastic content,’ and students are reading it.
“I think it’s a tremendous victory for student free expression.”
Meyers started the independent paper with fellow senior Leah Larson and sophomore Rosie Steinbach after FGHS’s former official paper, The Viking Log, was re-branded and re-named last fall. He said he sees The VLU as a complement to The Forest, which published its second issue Friday.
The Forest’s main December story is about holiday gifts, and inside stories deal with volunteering, holiday traditions around the world and rankings of TV Christmas specials.
The VLU “is in no way competitive with FGHS’s class-run newspaper, The Forest,” led by journalism teacher Allison Marks, a note in The VLU’s staff box reads.
On the cover of The VLU’s Dec. 16 edition is a feature story about depression and suicide. Inside are stories about contrasting teaching styles, surviving acne and the high school’s equestrian club.
Activities director Howard Sullivan praised The VLU as “a quality newspaper” and lauded the staff’s efforts to “take what they’ve learned in class” and apply those skills elsewhere.
“It’s a joy to see them use their education to create something that’s their own,” said Sullivan. He added that The VLU’s success “doesn’t take anything away from The Forest.”
Principal Karen Robinson did not answer the News-Times’ questions about her impressions of content in the first issue of The VLU, writing in an e-mail only that she is “proud of so many of our students at Forest Grove High School for going above and beyond the learning expectations of the classroom.”

description.hltext_display: El Real Madrid quiere cerrar bien el año antes del parón
description.content:
Durante los cinco meses que llevan de temporada José Mourinho ha sido el protagonista indiscutible del equipo blanco y en el cierre el año no podía ser menos , aunque en este caso lo será por su silencio, ya que, tras su polémica rueda de prensa del pasado domingo, este martes cedió su asiento en la sala de prensa a Aitor Karanka, sin ofrecer explicaciones para este cambio.
De esta forma, la noticia es la ausencia de noticia, ya que el vasco , que se sentó en el banquillo cuando el luso estuvo lesionados, algo que no sucederá ante el Levante, se ha limitado a asegurar que no existe problema alguno y que en lo único que piensan es en estar en Cibeles.
Así, lo único destacable son las bajas para el partido en el que los blancos buscan dar su primer paso hacia cuartos. Mourinho sólo da descanso a Sergio Ramos, que forzó para estar ante el Sevilla, y cuenta con todos los disponibles, además de los canteranos Pacheco, Juanfran y Morata.
Por su parte, el Levante llegará al Santiago Bernabéu con la intención de dar la 'campanada', a sabiendas de que el objetivo es complicado debido al nivel del equipo rival. En el caso de no conseguirlo, la premisa que es han marcado los jugadores que entrena Luis García es anotar al menos un gol en el feudo madridista.
El preparador levantinista no podrá contar los lesionados de larga duración, ni con el portero Reina, que finalmente no se ha recuperado de sus molestias. El que finalmente sí que ha entrado en la lista de 21 convocados es el delantero Felipe Caicedo. El técnico podría dar minutos a los menos habituales, ya que considera que el equipo no baja el nivel por la igualdad que existe en la plantilla azulgrana. Sevilla y Málaga buscan aliviar su situación El Sevilla, vigente campeón, recibe al Málaga en uno de los peores momentos de los últimos años, sin conocer la victoria en los últimos siete compromisos entre Liga BBVA y Europa League, y con la necesidad imperiosa de salir de esa dinámica negativa, ante un conjunto de Manuel Pellegrini que tampoco encuentra la manera de corregir el mal juego de los suyos, y que ocupa actualmente uno de los puestos de descenso a la Liga Adelante.
El equipo de Gregorio Manzano no tiene otra que conseguir una victoria a costa de un rival teóricamente propicio y ante su público, que comienza a perder la fe en que se cumplan los objetivos marcados, pero que, a la vez, tiene en la campaña pasada el precedente de una temporada irregular que puede resultar exitosa gracias a la Copa del Rey.
Los malagueños, a la espera de la llegada de refuerzos en el mercado invernal, tratarán de poner las cosas difíciles en un Sánchez Pizjuán que se les da especialmente bien. No obstante, la preocupación por la situación liguera puede suponer una losa en la moral de los albiazules.
Por su parte, el Atlético de Madrid y el Espanyol se ven las caras en un duelo al que ambos llegan con trayectorias diferentes, ya que si los madrileños se reencontraron con el triunfo este fin de semana, los barceloneses vieron cortado su gran momento con una goleada en el derbi ante el FC Barcelona.
Los de Quique Sánchez Flores se aferran a la Copa del Rey después de caer eliminados en la primera fase de la Europa League , conscientes de que esta competición y la Liga BBVA son ahora sus únicos objetivos tras el traspié continental.
Y es que el Atlético, con la duda de Diego Forlán, inmerso en un estado febril, aspira a repetir presencia finalista como hiciera este año y para ello debe empezar tomándose la revancha de finales de noviembre cuando cayó por 2-3.
El Espanyol encara el viaje al Vicente Calderón con las ganas de olvidar la derrota del pasado sábado en el derbi contra el Barça (1-5) repitiendo su gran partido de aquél día, una de sus pocas actuaciones brillantes a domicilio en esta campaña.
Pochettino viajará pendiente de Manu Molina, que entrena con una protección nasal tras su fractura del tabique y con las bajas de Javi López, a pesar de estar recuperado de su lesión en el recto anterior izquierdo, y de Aldo Duscher, que el lunes viajó a Argentina para asistir al funeral de un familiar.

description.hltext_display: L'Arc-en-ciel prépare sa nouvelle création
description.author: admin
description.content:
Activité de ruche au Cochon qui swingue, le nouveau lieu dédié au divertissement et à la culture, géré par le théâtre de l'Arc-en-ciel, qui ouvrira ses portes en janvier. Jean-Marie Rohou, maître des lieux et véritable homme-orchestre « n'arrête pas » mais, entre les répétitions et les recherches de costumes et décors, il trouve encore l'énergie des passionnés pour soulever le voile sur son nouveau spectacle.

description.hltext_display: '32423개' 찬호 공 하나당 300만원 벌었다
description.content:
17년 미국 생활을 접은 박찬호는 과연 공 하나당 얼마를 벌었을까.
오릭스행이 결정된 박찬호는 현재로서는 빅리그로 돌아갈 확률이 거의 없다. 박찬호 본인이 이미 "국가대표에서 은퇴할 때와 마찬가지 심정이다. 메이저리그를 떠나게 된 게 서글프다"고 했다. 이제 박찬호의 메이저리그 경력은 사실상 마침표를 찍은 셈이다.
박찬호가 빅리그에서 통산 124승을 거두는 동안 총 투구수는 3만2423개였다. 메이저리그 전문 웹사이트인 '베이스볼 레퍼런스'가 집계한 박찬호의 메이저리그 정규시즌 총 투구수다. 그밖의 빅리그 관련 웹사이트에선 박찬호의 총 투구수를 확인하기 힘들다.
공교롭게도 '32423'이란 숫자는 뒤집어도 똑같다. 굉장한 우연의 일치겠지만, 마치 일본에서의 새 출발을 상징하는 듯하다.
야구공의 실밥수가 108개다. 때문에 흔히 야구에서의 수싸움을 '108번뇌'와 비유하곤 한다. 전형적인 '디지틀 스포츠'인 프로야구는 투수의 공 하나에서부터 모든 플레이가 시작된다. 박찬호는 짧지 않은 메이저리그 경력 동안 3만2423번의 번뇌를 겪었다고 해도 과언이 아닐 것이다.
그 중에는 박찬호조차 "정신이 하나도 없었다"고 말했던 메이저리그 데뷔 첫 투구, 배리 본즈에게 내준 홈런 신기록 71호와 72호, 첫 완봉승을 거둘 때의 마지막 피칭, 노모 히데오를 넘어 124승을 달성했던 마지막 피칭, 결국엔 빅리그 마지막 등판이 된 지난 10월2일(한국시각) 플로리다 말린스 원정경기에서의 48개(탈삼진 6개·3이닝 무실점) 등이 모두 포함돼 있다. 일구일구가 모두 박찬호와 한국 야구의 역사였다.
역시 '베이스볼 레퍼런스'에 따르면, 박찬호가 미국에서 순수 몸값만으로 벌어들인 돈은 8655만6945달러다. 기타 옵션이나 CF 출연 수입은 배제된 금액. 22일 현재 환율로 환산하면 1000억1654만9947원이다.
따라서 총 투구수 3만2423개를 연봉 총합으로 나누면 공 하나당 308만4740원이란 계산이 나온다. 잔뜩 기합을 불어넣은 공 하나를 던질 때마다 박찬호는 평균 300만원 이상을 벌어들인 셈이다.
이같은 수치만 놓고 박찬호가 '겨우 공 하나 던지면서' 엄청난 돈을 벌었다고 판단하는 건 금물이다. 이 금액은 17년의 세월이 풍파 속에 만들어낸 평균이다. 박찬호가 94년 미국 진출 직후 몇년 뛰지도 못하고 실패했다면, 공 하나당 몸값은 형편 없는 금액에 그쳤을 것이다. '뭘 그리 많이 받았나'라는 삐딱한 시선 보다는 '정말 많은 노력 끝에 공 한개의 가치를 끌어올렸다'는 시선이 올바른 것이다.
때론 공 하나를 다시 던지기 위해 엄청난 재활의 과정을 거친 박찬호다. 그가 흘렸던 땀방울이 3만2423개의 야구공에 녹아있다. 이제 일본으로 옮겼지만, 한국 야구팬들은 빅리거 박찬호의 과거를 충분히 자랑스러워해도 된다. 김남형 기자 star@sportschosun.com

description.hltext_display: Dany Boon les a séduits
description.author: admin
description.content: Hier, après Caen et avant Fécamp et Rouen, c'est au cinéma Gaumont des Docks Vauban que le marathon normand de l'avant-première du film Rien à déclarer a fait escale. Dany Boon, accompagné d'une partie de la distribution, Julie Bernard, Zinedine Soualem, Bruno Lochet, a été accueilli par une foule en liesse. La fine équipe, composée de deux douaniers, l'un belge (Benoît Poelvoorde), francophobe et impulsif, l'autre français (Dany Boon), amoureux de la sœur du premier et un tantinet poltron, a fait mouche auprès des spectateurs havrais. en lire plus

description.hltext_display: Gross enrolment ratio in country is yet to pick up
description.content:
NEW DELHI: Noting that the gross enrolment ratio (GER) is "abysmally low" in the country, a senior HRD Ministry official said India should achieve 30 per cent GER in higher education by 2020, as against the current 11 per cent.
"There is no denying that we are abysmally low in terms of GER. We are half of the world's average in terms of the enrolment in higher education, but its not unachievable. Till 2020, we must aim for 30 per cent GER," Sunil Kumar, Additional Secretary (Higher Education), said.
Stressing on the need for raising the GER, Kumar said, "We need 500 odd universities, 15,000 colleges, 10,000 technical institutions, 75,000 engineering colleges to reach the target. This, however, requires a budget of over Rs 80 lakh till 2020, without the running expenses."
Addressing 'National Summit on Higher Education', he said in the higher education, the contribution of state governments is nothing more than "maintaining the existing" higher education colleges or institutes.
Pointing that private investment should not be done just for the sake of increasing the infrastructure, he said that infrastructure should not be equated with quality education.
"Education is not just like any other commodity. It requires investment of a different kind. The investors (companies or individuals) should be passionate about education," he said.

description.hltext_display: Le retour d'une tradition
description.author: admin
description.content:
C'est une expérience. Cette année, dans la paroisse Saint-Yves-de-la-Mer, à Noël, une messe sera célébrée à minuit. Elle aura lieu à l'église Saint-François. « La première fois depuis un certain temps », commente le curé de cette paroisse, l'abbé Bruno Golfier, qui concélébrera avec le père Eric Dubocage. Rappelons que dès la fin des années soixante, au Havre comme ailleurs, des messes « de la nuit » ont supplanté les messes « de minuit ». C'est donc au retour d'une tradition que l'on va assister à Saint-François.

description.hltext_display: Japan sees bleak export conditions
description.author: IBTimes Staff Reporter
description.content:
Japan's economic recovery seems to be pausing, though there are signs of a moderate recovery, the (BoJ) said in a statement on Wednesday. Japans's economy recovery has been struggling since October when much of benefits and positive factors seen earlier in the year evened out or stopped. Exports have been flat, housing investment has leveled out and corporate profits have begun to grow at a slower pace.
Unemployment continues to be high but the severity seen in employment and the income situation has eased somewhat, the report said.
"As for private consumption, demand for some goods has suffered a reverse after the sharp increase seen previously," the report added.
Reflecting these developments in demand both at home and abroad, production has recently declined slightly and business sentiment has also been somewhat weak, particularly in the manufacturing sector, the report said. Japan's economy has been fighting deflation since 1998. Though there was slight inflation seen in October for the first time in 24 months, most economists believe that this would not be sustainable. The economy has actually seen inflation turn positive on several occasions in the past, mainly due to food or energy price increases.
The central bank announced on Tuesday that it continued to keep interest rates between zero and 0.1 percent, as the recovery seems to be faltering and the Japanese yen grows weaker against the dollar.
Japan continues to bank on the global economic recovery for demand to improve and relies less on domestic demand.
The BoJ said exports are likely to remain "more or less flat for the time being," but expects a moderate increase, reflecting the improvement in overseas economic conditions.
The yen has remained weak against the dollar and the euro for the past month. The currency fell against 9 or its 16 major counterparts on Wednesday morning.
While business investment will become more pronounced as corporate profits improve, the pace will remain moderate with the firms' persistent sense of excessive capital stock, the bank said.
"In these circumstances, production is expected to increase, after showing temporary weakness primarily in durable consumer goods," the bank added.
Domestic demand, meanwhile, remains shaky even as consumer prices, including fresh food, fall on a year-on-year basis due to a slack in the economy. A rise in international commodity prices is expected to drive up corporate goods prices moderately.

description.hltext_display: China shares end lower as property fever ebbs
description.content:
SHANGHAI Dec 22 (Reuters) - China's key stock index closed down 0.9 percent on Wednesday as speculation in property stocks a day earlier died down, while cash flows in stock trading slowed due to a liquidity crunch in the money market.
Most institutions, such as brokerages and insurers, have also met their 2010 annual financial targets, and are not willing to conduct major transactions in the final few trading days of the year, traders said.
The benchmark Shanghai Composite Index .SSEC ended at 2,877.9 points after rising 1.8 percent on Tuesday, driven by speculation in property stocks.
Shanghai's property index .SSEP edged down 0.3 percent to 3,532.3 after jumping 5.4 percent on Tuesday as speculators and mutual funds built heavy positions on a report forecasting urban housing prices would jump 20 percent next year.
Top property issue China Vanke 000002.SZ, Wednesday's most actively traded stock, dropped 1.4 percent after jumping its 10 percent daily limit on Tuesday.
The money market is in an acute squeeze after a slew of official monetary tightening steps since mid-October, with the benchmark short-term rate rising another 8 basis points to a fresh more than two-year high on Wednesday. [CN/] ($1 = 6.66 yuan) (Reporting by Lu Jianxin and Jacqueline Wong)
