description.hltext_display: Misterios y secretos
description.content:
La ley Sinde se quedó sin de... Sin decretar. Lo de ayer no fue una sesión parlamentaria, sino una película de suspense con la ley Sinde, sin dejar de dar tumbos. Ahora la aprobamos, ahora la retiramos, ahora la votamos, ahora la descartamos... Informábamos ayer de la ley Sinde, que busca el cierre de páginas web de intercambio de contenidos. En un cuadro de apoyo, leíamos las declaraciones de un tal Aldo Olcese, a quien LA GACETA presentaba como “presidente de esta coalición”. ¿De qué coalición? se preguntarán ustedes. Pues eso mismo me pregunté yo, y supongo que decenas de miles de lectores –cada vez más, oiga– porque no había ni rastro en toda la página de la misteriosa coalición. Revisé este diario hasta de canto. Y nada, ni rastro. La respuesta la encontré en una web, una de esas que la ministra Sinde quiere cerrar en defensa de la libertad de creación. El mencionado Olcese es presidente de la Coalición de Creadores e Industrias de Contenidos. Seguro que LA GACETA no pretendía fomentar el misterio, sino ser prudente, no fuera a ser que nos quisieran cobrar derechos de autor por escribir su nombre estos creadores que lo que más crean son cuotas.
Es Navidad. El Misterio está de moda. Y el secreto, ni les cuento. Por secreto entiéndase algo oculto, y no el secreto ibérico cuya simple mención es denunciable por talibanes de instituto. Después de lo ocurrido a un profesor por mentar el cerdo en clase del musulmán, que se vaya preparando Bertín Osborne por anunciar esas patas negras que están para comérselas. Jamones no sé, pero atocinados sobran un montón.
Volviendo a la moda del secreto, Zapatero, siempre a la última (a la última pregunta) se hace el interesante lanzando el rumor de que el secreto mejor guardado del PSOE –o sea, si va a seguir o nos va a hacer un favor a todos– ya está decidido. Suspense. De hecho, el hombre este que vive en La Moncloa ha confesado sus intenciones. Suspense. Sólo dos personas conocen la respuesta al enigma. Suspense. Una es su mujer y la otra, a saber. Suspense. Mira que si, después de tanta expectativa, Zapatero decidiera seguir al frente del desgobierno... Suspenso.
Si de verdad hay un secreto, el que lo conoce sin duda es Rubalcaba. La liebre cántabra siempre sabe más de lo que dice y nunca dice todo lo que sabe. Si ZP se acercara a su vicepresidente y le susurrara: “Tengo un secreto. Ya sé quién va ser el próximo candidato del PSOE”, no les extrañe que la respuesta de Rubalcaba fuera: “Ya sabía que lo sabías”.

description.hltext_display: GoM: Gulfsands Petroleum announces sale of three Gulf of Mexico properties
description.content:
Gulfsands Petroleum, the oil and gas production, exploration and development company with activities in Syria, Iraq, Tunisia, Italy and the U.S.A., has announced the sale of three properties from the Company's asset portfolio. These non-core producing properties are located in the shallow water shelf area of the and the disposal is a part of the Company's ongoing plans to rationalize its US oil and gas property portfolio. The properties include various working interests in the Eugene Island 57/58 (EI 57/58) gas field, the Vermillion 379 (VR 379) oil and gas field and the South Pelto 13 (PL13) oil and gas field. The transaction has an effective date of 1st May, 2010 and a sale price of US$4.2 million prior to closing adjustments. Completion of the transaction is expected to occur in late January 2011.
These properties are considered non-core due to either their production being dominated by natural gas (EI 57/58) or their relatively low working interest positions (VR 379 and PL 13). In addition to receipt of the cash consideration, the sale of these properties removes the Company's forward liability provision related to the decommissioning (plugging and abandonment of wells, decommissioning of facilities on these licences) and therefore the Company will be returned cash deposits that are currently held in escrow as security against these future liabilities. The amount of cash deposits expected to be returned will be approx. US$5.6 million.
The Company's pro forma proved and probable US working interest reserves at 31 December 2009, adjusted for this disposal, were 3.4 mmboe compared with 4.7 mmboe prior to the disposal.

description.hltext_display: Les derniers jours…
description.author: admin
description.content: Place Perret, le marché de Noël organisé par la Ville connaît ses derniers jours d'ouverture. On y trouve diverses idées de décoration pour les fêtes, ces produits artisanaux qui peuvent constituer de bonnes idées de cadeaux, du vin, du chocolat (avec dégustations), du pain d'épices et des produits de la mer. Profiter aussi volontiers de ce passage place Perret pour déguster une ou deux crêpes ou prendre un verre au bar, lequel, soulignons-le, bénéficie d'un fort joli décor ! C'est jusqu'à vendredi 16 h. Chaque jour de 11 h à 19 h 30.

description.hltext_display: Hannibal City Council changes fire chief impeachment code
description.content:
Posted: 6 mins ago
save
Get News Alerts
Sign up to receive news alerts and deals:
News Expert Deals
Stay updated:
0
comments
retweets
shared
|
more
Read more: Local, Politics, Community, Hannibal, City, Council, Fire, Chief, Carter, Impeachment, Code, Vehicles
HANNIBAL, MO. -- The Hannibal City Council gave initial approval Tuesday to proposals that would ban people from parking vehicles in their yards and keep commercial trucks off of residential streets.
According to the Hannibal Courier Post, a more controversial plan to ban commercial vehicles on residential property was tabled.
Councilmen also heard a final reading to get rid of the city code's impeachment language for the fire department's top administrator. The proposal stems from the controversy surrounding former Fire Chief Tim Carter. You'll recall he was suspended for unspecified reasons last year and with impeachment charges filed against him in February 2010. Fire board members say the change makes the fire chief subject to the same type of dismissal procedures as other city employees.
The council also: approved a contract extension for City Manager Jeff LaGarce and gave first readings to ordinances updating city code on harassment and cyberbullying.
They also heard a proposed agreement to pay for a new access road and parking lot at the airport.
Read the complete article from the Hannibal Courier Post here: http://www.hannibal.net/features/x1882976193/Controversy-erupts-over-Hannibal-commercial-vehicle-proposal

description.hltext_display: Latham Media Services Spots In The Florida Everglades A Red-bellied Woodpecker!
description.content: An Active Red-bellied Woodpecker! Down in the Everglades Latham Media Services (LMS) working on the first photo research expedition of 2010. These photos were taken on the third day of research in the Everglades. Specifically, the site was the welcome center at the main entrance. Traffic in the parking lot was fierce with lots of human activity that didn’t phase the woodpecker! Latham Media Services (LMS) specializes in nature photography! Life on the wild side! LMS is a beginning photography adventure on the road looking for that comforting photo that brings a unique peace, happiness, and pleasure to your home or office. LMS is not looking for the bizarre, not even looking for that once in a lifetime photo of nature but LMS is looking for nature's statement of life and celebration. The Red-bellied Woodpecker is pretty common, just hard to capture because they’re so elusive and active. For more information go to http://www.lathammediaservices.com. Lathammediaservices.com shows the event and lathammediaservicesblog.com tells the story, about that life and how LMS got the pictures. The main objective is for nature lovers to invite Latham Media Services into their home or business through our lens via the photos and merchandise they purchase. So, join Latham Media Services (LMS) in nature's celebration! ###

Passionné par sa ville
description.author: admin
description.content: Jean-Claude Malandain a réalisé quatre aquarelles de très grand format sur Le Havre, « une aventure à haut risque. Pas le droit à l'erreur ! ». Une nouvelle preuve d'amour envers sa ville, dont il peint depuis 25 ans les rues et les bords de mer. Avec une sensibilité très personnelle. Rien de froid dans les verticalités de l'architecture Perret. A ses pieds, la cité s'agite, voitures et piétons circulent dans un mouvement coloré donnant priorité à la vie. Aux détails, le Havrais reconnaîtra « sa » rue, enseignes lumineuses comprises. en lire plus

description.hltext_display: Cuestión de excesos
description.content:
De los muchos excesos vistos en los días pasados, prefiero los de la ficción de Álex de la Iglesia, a aquellos otros vividos en la cruda realidad de los funerales de Enrique Morente. Sí. Sentí vergüenza ajena al ver el espectáculo montado por familiares y amigos allá por donde iban. En la sede de la SGAE, en el teatro Isabel la Católica de Granada, o en esas declaraciones que saltaron no sé si voluntaria o involuntariamente a los medios, por las que supimos que habían realizado dos denuncias, dos, una antes del fallecimiento y otra después, a los responsables de la clínica, acusándoles de negligencia médica.
A las que los médicos se defendieron argumentando que Enrique tenía un cáncer de esófago de cuatro centímetros de largo. Viendo en todas las televisiones la secuencia, repetida una y otra vez, de su hija cantando delante del féretro, qué le vamos a hacer, también sentí vergüenza ajena. Con la hija, con las plañideras, con el cuadro completo. La jalearon, la arroparon y no hubo cadena que no repitiese la escena hasta la saciedad. Pero cada vez que veía las imágenes percibía lo mismo. El sonrojo vencía cualquier posibilidad de emoción. Como si algún artista se llevase las manos a la cabeza por lo mismo.
No creo que el termómetro del dolor tenga que ir unido a semejantes desmanes. Prefiero la admiración sobria, pero tan auténtica, del pueblo vallisoletano hacia Miguel Delibes. Del respetuosísimo duelo de sus silenciosos familiares. De los que presidieron, y esos sí me parecieron emocionantes, los trances de despedida a Berlanga, a Labordeta, a tantos otros.
Para excesos, ya digo, prefiero los de la ficción, que para eso Álex de la Iglesia se las pinta solo. Como los de su Balada triste. Y conste que lo dice alguien poco pudoroso. Pero hasta a la hora de montar circos, hay que distinguir. Que una cosa es expresar un sentimiento, y otra tener bula para montar un espectáculo. Espectáculos después de los cuales se acostumbra a pasar la gorra. No lo digo con maldad. Es sólo una impresión personal.
*A. Sempere es crítico de televisión.

description.hltext_display: Seniors Fund: Medicines are just too costly for senior
description.content:
Senior No. 136: This 66-year-old man receives just $120-a-month assistance. He asks for help paying for monthly medications.
Senior No. 137: This 74-year-old man still recalls the day he met his wife. He worked the fields to provide for his family. He seeks helps paying for medicine.
Senior No. 138: This 78-year-old man was married for 56 years before his wife recently died. He is missing all of his teeth and seeks help paying for dentures.
Senior No. 139: This 64-year-old woman had a heart condition and also has trouble eating. She must drink meal shakes but has difficulty with the cost.
Senior No. 140: This 71-year-old man is embarrassed when he can't participate in conversations because he is losing his hearing. He seeks help paying for a hearing aid.

description.hltext_display: Argentina cierra sus heridas
description.content:
12 represores de la dictadura de Videla han sido condenados a cadena perpetua por 181crímenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en el circuito de centros clandestinos de detención Club Atlético-Banco-Olimpo.
Un tribunal argentino ha condenado a cadena perpetua a doce represores de la dictadura militar (1976-1983) por los 181 crímenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en el circuito de centros clandestinos de detención Club Atlético-Banco-Olimpo (ABO), mientras que otros cuatro fueron sentenciados a 25 años de prisión y uno de los imputados fue absuelto.
Los condenados a la pena máxima son policías que trabajaron en estos centros , a quienes el tribunal consideró "partícipes necesarios" de los crímenes probados que se cometieron en dicho circuito. Entre ellos se encuentra Julio Simón, un torturador conocido como 'El Turco Julián', que ya había sido sentenciado a 25 años de cárcel por su implicación en la desaparición del matrimonio Poblete- Hlaczik y el robo del bebé que esperaban.
Con penas menores fueron sancionados los tres ex agentes de Inteligencia militar que estaban imputados y un comisario que, según reza el fallo, cooperaron en la comisión de estos delitos pero su participación no fue decisiva para que finalmente se produjera el resultado.
Varios delitos
Todos ellos han sido condenados por los delitos de privación ilegal de la libertad, tormentos y homicidio referidos a 181 de las al menos 1.500 personas que permanecieron detenidas en el circuito de ABO, que comenzó a funcionar en marzo de 1976 y se cerró en 1978, según informó la agencia Télam.
En cambio, el tribunal decidió absolver al policía Juan Carlos Falcón , ya que en ninguna de las audiencias celebradas en los últimos trece meses para escuchar los testimonios de las partes se han aportado pruebas concluyentes de la participación del agente en dichos sucesos.
La sentencia fue celebrada en la sala por familiares de las víctimas de esta represión con aplausos. A las afueras del tribunal, se congregó un grupo de personas que acompañó la alegría de las familias con un pequeño festival artístico y banderas de distintos colectivos.

description.hltext_display: Boeing Completes Acquisition of Summit Aeronautic Group in Montana
description.content:
Boeing (NYSE: BA) announced today the completion of the acquisition of the business and operations conducted by Summit Aeronautics Group in Helena, Montana. Terms of the transaction, announced on Nov. 22, were not disclosed.
The newly acquired business will be named Boeing Helena. It will become part of Boeing Fabrication, a division of Boeing Commercial Airplanes. Boeing Helena will manufacture titanium and other hard-metal structures for Boeing commercial aircraft including the 747-8, 767 and 787.

description.hltext_display: La venta de participaciones de lotería de Navidad por Internet aumenta un 11%
description.content:
La venta de participaciones en décimos de lotería de Navidad a través de Internet ha aumentado un 11% este año, especialmente entre los jóvenes, de entre 21 y 32 años, según Serviapuestas.
"Hemos detectado que los compradores más jóvenes son los que optan mayoritariamente por esta opción, ya que son los que destinan menos dinero a la compra de lotería", apunta el director de Serviapuestas, Sascha Badelt .
Según explica Badelt, al comprar participaciones en vez de décimos enteros se " optimiza el gasto en lotería " al tiempo que "se incrementa notablemente la probabilidad de conseguir premios", ya que por el mismo dinero el jugador puede hacerse con más números.
En la página web de Serviapuestas existen tres modalidades de hacerse con participaciones a través de peñas: el Super Décimo de Navidad (39,90 euros), en la que se juega un décimo del 66844 por cada dos participantes de esta peña y 100 números con terminaciones que van del 0 al 99 ; y el Super Gordo ( 59,90 euros ) y Super Bombo (100 euros), con las que se juegan 200 números con terminaciones distintas .
" La probabilidad de conseguir un premio participando en una de las Peñas crece , puesto que los usuarios que participan de éstas cuentan con un premio garantizado, al jugar con todas las terminaciones (del 0 al 99)", señala Badelt.

description.hltext_display: 【有馬記念水曜追い】ネヴァブション 最悪コースで力強い走り （競馬）
description.content:
２年連続で有馬記念に出走するネヴァブションは北Ｃ（ダート）コースで小野寺（レースは後藤）を背に単走で追い切られた。前日からの雨で馬場は水がたまった最悪のコンディション。それでもパワフルな動きで駆け抜けた。伊藤正師は「速い時計はもういらないし、気分良く走らせた。思った通りうまく行ったよ。もともと期待していた馬だし、このメンバーでもある程度やれると思う」と好感触だった。 【有馬記念】
[ 2010年12月22日 12:07 ]
ＰＲ

description.hltext_display: '日행' 박찬호를 바라보는 두 가지 시�
description.content:
[엑스포츠뉴스=김현희 기자] 선동열, 이종범, 정민태, 정민철로 시작된 한국 선수들의 일본 프로무대 진출은 이승엽, 이병규, 이혜천, 임창용, 김태균, 이범호 등으로 이어졌다. 이들 중 일본무대에서 ‘성공’했다고 하는 이들은 얼마 되지 않는다. 국가대표팀에 선발되어 4번 타자를 맡았던 이승엽과 김태균은 일본 무대에서 20홈런 이상을 기록했고, ‘야쿠르트의 수호신’ 임창용을 비롯하여 ‘나고야의 태양’ 선동열 정도가 성공한 케이스라고 볼 수 있다. 단순 숫자로만 놓고 봤을 때 일본 진출 성공률은 절반도 되지 않는 셈이다.
바로 이러한 때에 ‘동양인 메이저리그 최다승 투수(124승)’ 박찬호마저 오릭스 버팔로스 유니폼을 입으며 세간의 관심을 모았다. 월드시리즈 우승 반지를 끼고 싶다는 꿈을 잠시 뒤로한 채 태평양을 건너온 그를 두고 많은 이야기가 오가고 있다. 무엇보다도 태극마크를 달고 대표팀의 중심에 서 있었던 박찬호/이승엽을 한 팀에서 볼 수 있다는 것 자체가 큰 관심거리이기 때문이다.
그렇다면, 내년 시즌 종료 후 박찬호가 받게 될 평가는 어떠한 방향으로 흐르게 될까.
일본무대 진출 성공의 이유
이에 대해 일본 프로야구를 누구보다도 잘 아는 두 원로, 백인천 전 LG 감독과 김성근 SK 감독은 박찬호의 일본무대 성공 유무에 대해 ‘성공한다.’라고 입 모아 이야기한 바 있다. 사실 일본 무대에 진출한 많은 외국인 선수들 중 박찬호만큼 화려한 커리어를 자랑했던 선수는 몇 명 되지 않았다. 대부분 메이저리그에서 백업 멤버로 전전하다가 태평양을 건너온 선수들이 많았다. 그런 점에 있어서 메이저리그에서 세 자리 승수를 거둔 박찬호의 합류는 그 자체만으로도 성공을 점칠 수 있게 하는 요인이다.
박찬호의 신체 나이가 여전히 현역 선수로 건재하다는 사실도 반가운 부분이다. 최고 구속 150km를 넘나드는 직구 구속을 비롯하여 경기를 치를수록 노련해지는 경기운영능력은 박찬호가 지닌 최고의 장기다. 또한, 재일교포 3세인 박리혜씨의 원래 근거지가 일본이었다는 사실도 박찬호에 큰 심리적인 안정감을 가져다줄 수 있다. 여러모로 박찬호의 성공 가능성에 무게를 둘 수밖에 없는 이유다. 선발로 나설 경우 두 자리 승수, 마무리로 나설 경우 야쿠르트의 임창용 못지않은 세이브 숫자를 기대해 볼 수 있다.
일본무대 진출의 회의적인 시각도 있다
그러나 박찬호의 일본무대 진출에 대해 회의적인 시각으로 바라보는 이들도 있다. 메이저리그와는 다소 판이한 일본 리그의 성격 때문이다. ‘빅볼’을 추구하는 메이저리그와는 달리 ,일본야구는 세심한 데이터 야구, 다시 말해 ‘스몰 볼’이 대세다. 웬만한 유인구에 타자들의 방망이가 돌아가지 않고, 득점 찬스 때마다 나오는 번트 작전 등은 상대 투수의 골머리를 앓게 한다. 메이저리그에 맛을 들인 박찬호가 의외로 고전할 가능성도 배제할 수 없다. 넥센 정민태 코치를 비롯한 KIA의 이종범 등이 “일본 야구는 사람을 피곤하게 만든다.”라고 이야기하는 것을 가벼이 들을 수 없는 이유다.

description.hltext_display: DJ Tesco Bank Partners With Blackhawk Netw...
Tees Maar Khan to take on Pirates
description.content:
This is also the reason why the producers are putting immense pressures on the pirates this week.
Tees Maar Khan (TMK), 2010’s much awaited movie, is all set to take on movie pirates just before its release. Bollywood wants to end the year on a good note and all hopes are on Farha Khan’s next release Tees Maar Khan. This is also the reason why the producers are putting immense pressures on the pirates this week.
Alliance Against Copyright Theft (AACT) has rendered its full support to the producers of the film. Anybody seen in possession of a TMK pirated CD/DVD will be booked under the Indian Copyright Act, 1957. AACT's enforcement consultants have planned raids at various locations across India to seize pirated goods like inlay cards, DVD writers and other equipment.
Siddharth Roy Kapur, CEO, UTV Motion Pictures who are also the producers of the movie says, "The entire team of TMK is working hard to curb piracy. We are working closely with the authorities to intercept attempts to copy or distribute pirated versions of the movie. It is important for our industry to collaborate with AACT against piracy. We will continue putting pressure on the pirates till the release and post release as well."
Farah Khan, Director, Tees Maar Khan says, “In the last three years the biggest hits have released on Christmas, and with TMK we are confident of continuing the trend. Over the last month we have been appealing to the audiences to refrain from buying pirated copies of the movie. Our enforcement team is keeping a close eye on pirates across India. We seek support from the public as well and request them to call on the toll free 1800-103-1919 to report on piracy.”
AA Khan, Former ATS Chief & enforcement consultant, says, “Tees Maar Khan is a big budget film. We are estimating a strong, widespread network of pirates working towards this movie’s piracy. The first week for any new release is crucial for collections and hence, our team has strategically planned its counter attack during this period to curb piracy of the movie.”
AACT has seized pirated goods worth Rs. 2 crore over the past month and a half. Nearly 100 people have also been arrested in connection with video piracy. The seizures worth Rs. 2 crore included 1,66,114 CDs and DVDs, 3,700 inlay cards and 35 DVD writers.

description.hltext_display: 债券型基金净值最近一周增长龙虎榜(20101220)
L1 / PSG : Kombouaré-Sessegnon, ça brûle
description.content:
PSG-Monaco pourrait être le dernier match de Stéphane Sessegnon sous les couleurs parisiennes. Lassé par son statut de remplaçant, comme c'était le cas face aux Monégasques et depuis le match perdu à Sochaux en août dernier, le milieu béninois aurait rencontré Antoine Kombouaré dans son bureau mardi midi au Camp des Loges pour évoquer son avenir personnel. L'ancien Manceau aurait alors répété avec insistance ses envies de départ. Selon l'Equipe, l'entraîneur du PSG se serait énervé et l'aurait fait sortir de son bureau après avoir tenu des propos insultants.
Le Béninois faisait pourtant partie des dix-huit joueurs retenus pour faire le (19eme journée de L1). Mais celui-ci ne se serait pas rendu au rendez-vous fixé à 17h, mardi au Parc des Princes pour prendre la direction de la Lorraine. « Antoine Kombouaré et Stéphane Sessegnon ont eu une discussion, a pourtant expliqué un porte-parole du club à l'Equipe. A la suite de cet entretien, Antoine Kombouaré a préféré laisser le joueur souffler pour lui permettre de couper en espérant qu'il revienne régénéré de ses vacances. » Stéphane Sessegnon devrait en profiter pour oublier son début de saison décevant, marqué par seulement quatre titularisations sur ses quatorze matchs joués.
Selon le site anglais Sport.co, Stéphane Sessegnon serait suivi par Arsenal, Tottenham, Liverpool, West Ham et Everton. Sous contrat jusqu'en juin 2013, le milieu de terrain âgé de 26 ans pourrait être attiré par la Premier League. Pourtant, Antoine Kombouaré ne souhaite voir aucun joueur partir cet hiver. « Aujourd'hui, je suis très content de mon groupe. J'ai déjà dit aux joueurs qu'il n'y aurait pas de départ. Je défends les intérêts du club, alors si un joueur veut partir, c'est niet, a-t-il déclaré en conférence de presse. On a besoin de tout le monde parce qu'on n'est pas nombreux. J'ai un bon groupe en termes de qualité, mais en quantité, on est restreints. Si on n'a pas de pépins, on peut aller chercher un trophée avec ce groupe. » Ce clash pourrait cependant avoir un effet néfaste sur la belle dynamique actuelle du PSG.

description.hltext_display: Balder köper av Catena för 1,6 mdr
description.content: Fastighetsbolaget Balder tänker lägga ett bud på 25 handelsfastigheter i Stockholm, Göteborg och Öresundsregionen som i dag ägs av Catena. Budet beräknas landa på 1,6 miljarder kronor. Catenas styrelse har beslutat att gå med på affären, enligt ett pressmeddelande.

description.hltext_display: La Policía Nacional y la Local potencian las operaciones conjuntas
description.content:
La Policía Nacional y la Local potencian las operaciones conjuntas
Durante este año se han desarrollado 137 actuaciones en las que se identificó a 400 personas y se controlaron 70 vehículos
El municipio de Alcalá de Guadaíra potenciará los dispositivos conjuntos del Cuerpo Nacional de Policía y la Policía Local gracias a los nuevos recursos comprometidos por el subdelegado del Gobierno en Sevilla, Faustino Valdés, según manifestó el propio representante del Ejecutivo al alcalde, Antonio Gutiérrez Limones (PSOE), en la última reunión de la junta local de Seguridad. "Se trata de potenciar los dispositivos conjuntos con recursos provinciales siguiendo la pauta de trabajo habitual que se ha instaurado en la ciudad con la nueva Comisaría y la oficina conjunta de denuncias para ser más efectivos y transmitir al ciudadano una mayor seguridad".
Asimismo, se acordó la presencia de unidades de caballería para mejorar dichos controles y poder actuar también en aquellas zonas en las que pueden trabajar, como senderos y parques naturales, que en la ciudad son muy prolíficos. A lo largo de este año se han realizado 137 dispositivos especiales conjuntos, en los que se han identificado a casi 400 ciudadanos, controlado más de 70 vehículos y levantado actas de muy diverso tipo, cuestión que para las autoridades "contribuyen a la prevención real y a la sensación de seguridad local".
Estas medidas preventivas "ayudan a disminuir delitos en el futuro más inmediato y a más largo plazo, como por ejemplo el robo de cables, cuya dinámica tristemente se está percibiendo en toda Europa", explicó el subdelegado, Faustino Valdés.
Por su parte, Gutiérrez Limones explicó que "se está trabajando con el Ministerio en Madrid tanto por parte de la Subdelegación como por parte del Senado para intentar que este tipo de delitos sean perseguidos de otra manera, con más dureza".
Por último, Faustino Valdés especificó que el cuartel de la Guardia Civil va a permanecer en Alcalá, "máxime con las inversiones que se han realizado en él en los últimos años, dado que la misión de este cuerpo es muy distinta a la de otros y Alcalá es una localidad muy grande que requiere de todas estas funciones".

description.hltext_display: US poised to approve nuclear arms pact with Russia
description.author: DESMOND BUTLER
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military. "We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact. "We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed. "The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, `I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'" Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.

description.hltext_display: Saint-Etienne : ils refusent le contrôle dans un véhicule volé
description.content: Lundi soir, un automobiliste a refusé un contrôle de police boulevard Jules-Janin. Il n’est pas allé bien loin, puisqu’il a perdu le contrôle et a fini sa course sur un terre-plein. Le conducteur et son passager ont été arrêtés. Outre le fait qu’aucun n’avait le permis, le véhicule s’avérait volé. Ils seront poursuivis pour vol, refus d’obtempérer et défaut de permis...

description.hltext_display: � �문가들이 본 가능성
description.content:
야구인들과 팬들은 박찬호(37·오릭스)가 또다시 '슈퍼맨'이 되기를 바란다. 적잖은 나이에 낯선 무대에 도전하는 그가 일본에서도 '선발 10승' 정도를 올려줄 것을 희망한다. 한국인 최초의 빅리거, 메이저리그 아시아 최다승(124승) 투수에 대한 마음이다. 그러나 박찬호의 전성기는 지났다. 또 일본야구는 그가 17년간 뛰었던 메이저리그와 다르기에 기대만큼의 걱정이 공존한다. 일본에서의 성공 가능성에 대한 야구 전문가들이 분석했다.
비관론-까다로운 일본타자들
박찬호의 성공을 걱정하는 가장 큰 이유는 미·일의 스타일의 차이다. 그를 직접 지도한 적이 있는 김성근 SK 감독은 "미국과 일본의 스트라이크존 차이가 있으니 쉽게 적응하긴 어려울 것이다. 박찬호는 일본 투수들처럼 정교한 컨트롤을 갖추지 않았다"고 냉정하게 평가했다.
하일성 KBS N스포츠 해설위원도 "스트라이크존 적응에 시간이 필요할 것"이라고 했다. 메이저리그 스트라이크존은 타자 바깥쪽 공에 후하다. 위아래보다는 좌우폭 활용이 중요하다. 반면 일본은 몸쪽 스트라이크를 잘 잡아주고, 낮은 코스에 후하기 때문에 박찬호가 여기에 빨리 적응해야 한다.
게다가 풀스윙을 즐기는 메이저리그 타자들과 달리 일본 타자들은 컨택트에 초점을 둔다. 미국이나 한국에서 뛴 투수들이 일본에 진출해서 가장 힘들어하는 부분이다. '투수 조련사' 김시진 넥센 감독은 "차분하게 공을 기다리는 일본 타자들을 상대하기 위해선 하루 빨리 적응해야 한다"이라고 조언했다.
아울러 노장들에게 찾아오는 갑작스러운 노쇠화, 또 야구장 밖의 환경 변화 등도 박찬호를 위협할 요소다.
낙관론-통산 124승의 커리어
긍정적인 의견으로는 박찬호의 힘보다는 정신력을 믿었다. 기술적 어려움이 뒤따르겠지만 강한 의지로 이겨낼 수 있다는 것이다.
김성근 감독은 "메이저리그 커리어를 무시할 수 없다. 박찬호는 성공에 대한 의지가 강한 선수다"라며 기대를 드러냈다. 하 위원은 "박찬호의 체인지업과 슬러브는 일본에서 충분히 통할 수준"이라고 구체적으로 거들었다. 전성기의 강속구는 잃었지만 이를 극복하는 과정에서 제구력과 변화구 구사가 좋아진 점을 높게 평가하는 것이다.
김인식 한국야구위원회(KBO) 기술위원장은 낙관론을 펼쳤다. 김 위원장은 "사실 박찬호의 공은 올해도 굉장히 좋았다. 일본에서 10승은 충분히 가능하다"고 말했다. 정민철 한화 코치도 "기회가 주어지면 10승은 어렵지 않을 것"이라고 장담했다.
박찬호 생존 전략은 '강속구'
전문가들의 의견이 각자 엇갈리면서도 공통점 하나가 있었다. 투수에게 가장 기본적인 '직구 스피드 회복'을 성공의 필수조건으로 꼽았다.
박찬호가 메이저리그에서 최근까지 재미를 봤던 구종은 투심패스트볼과 서클체인지업이다. 스트라이크존과 타자 성향을 따져보면 일본에서도 가장 유용할 구종이다. 커브, 슬라이더, 슬러브도 던지지만 이들 변화구는 일본에서 통하기 어렵다는 게 정설이다.
박찬호가 주무기인 투심패스트볼과 서클체인지업을 잘 활용하고, 마리아노 리베라(뉴욕 양키스)로부터 배웠다는 컷패스트볼 위력을 높이기 위해서는 역시 직구(포심패스트볼)의 부활이 바탕에 깔려야 한다. 평균 스피드가 시속 145~150㎞ 정도 나와야 한다. 박찬호는 지난해만 해도 시속 150㎞이 넘는 강속구를 자주 던졌다. 그러나 올해는 평균 구속이 140㎞ 중반대로 떨어졌고, 직구 구사 비율도 꽤 줄었다.
이용철 KBS 해설위원은 "키포인트는 역시 직구다. 직구가 살아나면 다양한 변화구들의 효과가 더 커질 것"이라며 "박찬호의 영민함은 일본에서 얼마나 잘 적응하느냐를 보면 될 것"이라고 덧붙였다.
김식 기자 [seek@joongang.co.kr]

description.hltext_display: 偏债型基金净值最近一周增长龙虎榜(20101220)
Operation Noel: Farmworker now out of job
description.author: David Burge \ El Paso Times
description.content:
Like so many other people across the nation, Miguel Lopez needs a job.
Miguel and Bertha Lopez have six children and desperately need money, said Maria Rios, a migrant specialist and recruiter with Region 19's migrant program.
Miguel Lopez is a farmworker, but his job is seasonal and he's out of work right now. He would like to find work in construction or as a handyman until the next farm season starts in March, Rios said.
The mother is a stay-at-home mom. The children are Yahaira, 19; Gritzel, 14; Jonathan, 13; Yeneira, 12; Yareth, 10; and Brayan, 8.
The oldest is a student at El Paso Community College, and the family is worried about paying for her college tuition so she can continue to take classes, Rios said.
The family could also use clothes and shoes.
"They are very good parents," Rios said. "They are looking for their kids to succeed and want them to get an education."
The two youngest children will get coats from Operation Noel.
David Burge may be reached at dburge@elpasotimes.com; 546-6126.

Read more: Local, Community, Business, Hannibal, Christmas, Dinner, Business, Good Deed, Lula Belles
A Hannibal business is preparing for an annual Christmas tradition.
Mike and Pam Ginsberg own Lula Belles restaurant in Hannibal.
According to the Hannibal Courier Post, for twenty years they've been offering this free Christmas dinner in their restaurant for folks in the community who may not be able to afford it or have no place to go during the holiday.
Approximately 150 meals are served here in the LulaBelle's dining room each year, and another 500 meals are delivered.
The dinner is free but a good will donation is accepted to help pay for the food.
Volunteers to serve and deliver meals are needed.
Call the restaurant to get involved. (573) 221-6662

description.hltext_display: Gross enrolment ratio in country is yet to pick up
description.content:
NEW DELHI: Noting that the gross enrolment ratio (GER) is "abysmally low" in the country, a senior HRD Ministry official said India should achieve 30 per cent GER in higher education by 2020, as against the current 11 per cent.
"There is no denying that we are abysmally low in terms of GER. We are half of the world's average in terms of the enrolment in higher education, but its not unachievable. Till 2020, we must aim for 30 per cent GER," Sunil Kumar, Additional Secretary (Higher Education), said.
Stressing on the need for raising the GER, Kumar said, "We need 500 odd universities, 15,000 colleges, 10,000 technical institutions, 75,000 engineering colleges to reach the target. This, however, requires a budget of over Rs 80 lakh till 2020, without the running expenses."
Addressing 'National Summit on Higher Education', he said in the higher education, the contribution of state governments is nothing more than "maintaining the existing" higher education colleges or institutes.
Pointing that private investment should not be done just for the sake of increasing the infrastructure, he said that infrastructure should not be equated with quality education.
"Education is not just like any other commodity. It requires investment of a different kind. The investors (companies or individuals) should be passionate about education," he said.

event_or_fact.property: We need 500 odd universities, 15,000 colleges, 10,000 technical institutions, 75,000 engineering colleges to reach the target.; This, however, requires a budget of over Rs 80 lakh till 2020, without the running expenses.

description.hltext_display: 股债平衡型基金净值最近一周增长龙虎榜(20101220)
Oregon unemployment rate ticks up to 10.6 percent in November
description.content:
State adds 6,300 jobs as rate stays about the same for 13 months
Oregon’s seasonally adjusted unemployment rate was 10.6 percent in November, essentially unchanged from 10.5 percent in October.
The rate has been between 10.5 percent and 10.7 percent for the most recent 13 months. Oregon’s unemployment rate was 10.7 percent in November 2009. The U.S. seasonally adjusted unemployment rate rose from 9.6 percent in October to 9.8 percent in November.
Oregon’s nonfarm payroll employment rose in November by 6,300 jobs, following a revised gain of 6,700 jobs in October.
In November, 209,601 Oregonians were unemployed.
State employment economist Nick Beleiciks said Dec. 14 that private sector employment added jobs in five of the past six months. Since its recent low point of 1.29 million in March, private payroll employment has gained 17,700 jobs, or 1.4 percent.
Beleiciks also said that for the first time, the state’s work force reached 2 million people. That’s an increase from 1.98 million people in October.
Population growth was most likely the reason behind the increase, Beleiciks said.
For the past year, employment has increased by 16,200 jobs or 1 percent. Many of the jobs were in the service sectors, where job growth was 2 percent during the past 12 months. During that same time, construction lost 5,000 jobs and financial activities lost 1,200 jobs.

event_or_fact.property: Population growth was most likely the reason behind the increase
private sector employment added jobs in five of the past six months.
for the first time, the state?s work force reached 2 million people.

description.hltext_display: El Guadalquivir sigue creciendo y anega ya varias zonas de la Cartuja
description.content: El nivel del Guadalquivir sigue creciendo. Ayer por la maana, el agua haba anegado ya varias zonas de la isla de la Cartuja. En Peaflor, el ro se encontraba ayer a 45,86 metros sobre el nivel del mar, con una tendencia creciente, mientras que en Sevilla se mantiene en 3,68 metros, aunque presenta una tendencia decreciente debido a la bajamar. Uno de los municipios que se encuentran en alerta es . Su alcalde, Francisco Javier Reinoso, mostr ayer su "temor" ante nuevas inundaciones y pidi a la Junta de Andaluca que "no espera a que lleguen trombas de agua para desembalsar". Adems, la lluvia gener un apagn en el Aljarafe, afectando a 8.000 clientes de Aznalcllar, Benacazn, Olivares y Sanlcar la Mayor.

description.hltext_display: 【有馬記念水曜追い】ペルーサにアンカツ手応え「力が抜けてる」 （競馬）
description.content:
有馬記念に念願の初Ｇ１制覇を懸けるペルーサ（牡３＝藤沢和）は安藤勝を背に芝コースでミッションモード（３歳１０００万）、ネオレボルーション（４歳５００万）、レンディル（４歳１６００万）、ウォンビーロング（３歳１０００万）を誘導。直線では半馬身差まで迫ったミッションモードを突き放し、１馬身半差つけてフィニッシュした。
追い切り後はゲートへ。約１分ほど枠内に駐立させたが、まずまずおとなしかった。３週連続でまたがった安藤勝は「追い切りは息を整える程度。ゲートの中でも、いい意味で力が抜けていた」と感触十分。藤沢和師も「ずいぶん練習したかいあってゲートはこの秋で一番良かった。今回こそ全力を出し切ってほしい」と期待を懸けた。 【有馬記念】
[ 2010年12月22日 12:11 ]
ＰＲ

description.hltext_display: Population Surge Gives Texas 4 New US House Seats
description.author: JAY ROOT
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas -- A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go.
Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too.
But Democrats say not so fast.
Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account.
"A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process."
The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast.
With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong.
Rep. Pete Gallego, D-Alpine, said if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats.
"It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand," he said.
Despite the party's recent gains in the November legislative elections, Republicans won't have unchecked authority to draw the state's congressional map to benefit themselves.
Civil rights laws require that the interests of minority voters be protected as district boundaries are redrawn, and Texas is one of the states whose redistricting plans require "pre-clearance" by federal authorities under the Voting Rights Act.
Democrats are also counting on an assist from the Obama administration, which could have a significant voice in the pre-clearance process. It is the first time since the Voting Rights Act passed that the Justice Department will be in Democratic hands during the redistricting process.
Hispanic growth doesn't automatically translate into Democratic growth, though. Two heavily Hispanic congressional seats in South Texas flipped to Republicans this year. There also are several new Latino GOP members about to be sworn into legislative seats.
South Texas Rep. Aaron Pena, who recently left the Democrat Party and became a Republican, said Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada.
Pena, who sits on the House Redistricting Committee, said his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats.
"The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs," Pena said. "It's truly a swing population."
Texas already had the largest Republican delegation in Congress, holding 20 of the state's 32 seats. In the 2010 elections, the party picked up another three seats, two of them in heavily Latino districts in South Texas. With all the new growth, Texas will now have 36 seats and 38 presidential electoral votes.
Federal lawsuits are essentially guaranteed as part of the process, and if the past is any guide, the courts will have a major say in how the lines are finally drawn. In 2001, the Texas Legislature deadlocked on Congressional redistricting, leaving the federal courts to redraw all the districts. In 2006, the U.S. Supreme Court ordered that new lines be drawn in several districts to protect the rights of Hispanic voters in South Texas.
Starting early next year, most state governments will use detailed, computer-generated data on voting patterns to carve neighborhoods in or out of newly drawn House districts, tilting them more to the left or right. Sometimes politicians play it safe, quietly agreeing to protect Republican and Democratic incumbents alike. But sometimes the party in control will gamble and aggressively try to reconfigure the map to dump as many opponents as possible.
The U.S. is still growing quickly relative to other developed nations. The population in France and England each increased roughly 5 percent over the past decade, while in Japan the number is largely unchanged, and Germany's population is declining. China grew at about 6 percent; Canada's growth rate is roughly 10 percent.
The 2010 census results also are used to distribute more than $400 billion in annual federal aid and will change each state's Electoral College votes beginning in the 2012 presidential election.
Apart from the respective four- and two-seat gains in Texas and Florida, Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington are all picking up one new U.S. House seat. Ohio and New York will lose two House seats each. Losing one House seat are Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
Each House district represents an electoral vote in the presidential election process, meaning the political map for the 2012 election will tilt somewhat more Republican.

event_or_fact.property: It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand
Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada

A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth; Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be
The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs; It's truly a swing population.
his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats
Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account

description.hltext_display: Phila. schools facing big budget shortfall
description.author: Jeff Shields and Kristen A. Graham
description.content:
Philadelphia School District officials are staring down a gap of $430 million or more in next year's budget, and the deficit could surpass the half-billion mark under worst-case scenarios, according to officials briefed on the district's finances.
In October, the district's chief financial officer, Michael Masch, warned the public that the 2011-12 budget could be grim, with $234 million in stimulus money drying up without funds to replace it.
Additional costs for staffing, health benefits and charter schools have made the situation worse, according to one of the sources briefed on the looming crisis. Each district department head may be asked to come up with reduction proposals of 12 percent, 24 percent, and 36 percent, according to another source.
The $430 million is more than 13 percent of the 2010-11 $3.2 billion budget. The gap could grow with additional state cuts and maximum enrollment at charter schools.
Mayor Nutter and School Superintendent Arlene Ackerman said in a hastily arranged conference call Tuesday night that they did not know the amount the district would need to make up in next year's budget. Ackerman called any figures other than the stimulus money "purely speculative." "I don't feel comfortable actually discussing this with the press, beyond the $234 million, as we are internally trying to look at a variety of scenarios," Ackerman said. "I really think it's unfair to report on budget exercises that may or may not be going on here." Nutter and Ackerman called the news conference after The Inquirer began asking questions about the budget. "We don't want to spend a lot of time speculating," the mayor said, acknowledging that the district, "like every other governmental entity, has some budget challenges." Referring to his budget proposal and that of Gov.-elect Tom Corbett, Nutter added: "There are a series of unknowns that won't be resolved or get additional clarity for weeks." Both budgets are expected in early March.
For two years, the district has relied on federal stimulus money and hefty aid packages from Harrisburg to balance its budget. Of the current $3.2 billion spending plan, $1.68 billion - 55 percent - comes from state aid.
An additional $234 million came from nonrecurring federal stimulus money that expires this year.
With the first Republican governor in eight years taking office in January, and staunch district ally Rep. Dwight Evans (D., Phila.) out as ranking Democrat in the House Appropriations Committee, the district could be in a tight spot.
In October, Masch warned the School Reform Commission - the state-appointed board overseeing district finances - that "some very tough budget decisions" were "inevitable" in the 2011-12 budget.
Referencing only the evaporating stimulus money at the time, he said his plan would try to minimize cuts to instruction and other initiatives credited for raising test scores for eight-plus years.
Nutter and Ackerman on Tuesday emphasized the eight years of gains in test scores and increases in graduation rates as evidence that federal and state money has been well invested in the district. "We want to make sure that programs that serve students, and serve them well, are not impacted," Nutter said. The School District raises about $600 million each year from its share of property taxes. The district has approached the city about raising an additional $54 million by increasing its share of the property tax pie from about 55 percent to 60 percent, according to a source with knowledge of the district's budget.
But political observers question whether the city could afford to give the district extra funding after two years of tax hikes and austere budgets. Nutter said the district had not asked for a funding increase.
School Reform Commissioner David F. Girard-diCarlo foreshadowed the crisis in May, when he only "reluctantly" supported the district's 2010-11 budget and said he feared for the district's financial future.
At the time, Girard-diCarlo said a "potential financial tsunami of almost biblical proportion" could loom. On Tuesday, Girard-diCarlo said it was too early to put a hard number on the looming budget deficit, before the new governor has taken office or Nutter has presented his budget. "We do not yet know the parameters of our governmental revenue," Girard-diCarlo said in an e-mail. "It would be irresponsible to not do some modeling given the realities facing the new [governor] and the elimination of the Fed's stimulus money. What will be forthcoming is most uncertain." The district's revenue gap could climb to more than $530 million depending on the levels of state aid and whether the district reaches its maximum levels of charter school enrollment, according to one of the sources with knowledge of the budget scenarios.
The district pays charter schools for each student enrolled.
Contact staff writer Kristen Graham at 215-854-5146 or kgraham@phillynews.com.

description.hltext_display: 偏股型基金净值最近一周增长龙虎榜(20101220)
Cloud Email Security Specialist Spamina Launches into UK
description.content:
Appoints Virtualisation Start-up Expert Daniel Power as UK Country Manager
Reading, December 21, 2010 - Spamina, a fast-growing player in the global email security market, has announced it is expanding its business model into the UK. Spamina's products allow small and medium enterprises (SME) as well as large corporations and managed service providers (MSP) to ensure email perimeter security via private, public and hybrid cloud-based solutions.
Spamina will offer UK resellers an industry-leading cloud-based email security platform, consisting of its Spamina Email Service and Email Firewall solutions that have been successfully deployed at thousands of businesses around the world.
To lead its expansion into the UK, Spamina has appointed virtualisation specialist Daniel Power as UK country manager. In this role, he will be responsible for introducing Spamina to UK resellers and MSPs as the company continues to build on its global success that has seen sales of over ten million mailboxes worldwide.
Power brings more than 25 years' experience building new markets for emerging brands in the UK. He most recently worked as sales manager at VDI distributor CDG, providing distribution support, consultancy and localised virtual vendor presence to companies across the UK. Previously, he has held senior management positions at software providers LANDesk, KACE and PowerQuest.
Power said: "UK firms are well aware of the security risks to corporate email, and as such represent one of the most lucrative markets in Europe for email security solutions. However, to date, most firms have adopted point solutions that provide a piecemeal and hard-to-manage approach to the problem. We intend to change this with our comprehensive, proven and fully-integrated email security offering."
About Spamina Spamina provides Cloud Email Security solutions for businesses and individuals to protect against attacks that occur via email. It offers ease of management and overall email control for system administrators and users, and provides protection for all devices where email is used (PC, laptop, BlackBerry, etc...)
Spamina (Aegis Security) has offices in Barcelona, Madrid, Milan, Paris, Reading (UK), Buenos Aires, Sao Paulo, Mexico City and San Francisco (USA). Its products and services are distributed through major distributors.
For more information on the services and features of Spamina solutions, please visit: www.spamina.com
Contact Tom Woods / James Carter Touchdown PR +44 (0) 1252 717 040 spamina@touchdownpr.com

description.hltext_display: 80 000 colis de Noël bloqués par la neige
description.author: Elle
description.content:
Photos/Vidéos liées
Que mettre au pied du sapin lorsque les cadeaux de Noël commandés à distance n'arrivent pas à temps ? Question existentielle s'il en est, que vous vous posez peut-être. La Poste a en effet annoncé que 80 000 colis enregistrent un retard d'au moins un jour par rapport à la date de livraison initialement prévue, en raison de la neige.Selon Europe 1, la Poste aurait précisé mardi avoir engagé des moyens exceptionnels pour résorber ces retards au mieux et que la plupart de ces colis tant attendus parviennent à leurs destinataires avant Noël. L'ouverture des bureaux de Poste devrait être prolongée jusqu'à 20 heures jeudi prochain " pour permettre aux clients de retirer le plus tardivement possible leurs colis ". Toutefois, certaines zones du pays, très touchées par les intempéries des derniers jours et toujours peu praticables comme la Normandie, la Champagne-Ardenne et la Lorraine, risquent de ne pas voir arriver leurs commandes avant la date fatidique.Si vous faites partie de ces naufragés du flocon discrets - pour le moment - qui n'ont toujours pas reçu leurs paquets, prenez contact avec vos commerçants et votre bureau de poste le plus proche.

description.hltext_display: 股票型基金净值最近一周增长龙虎榜(20101220)
Let me Hear Your Heart Beat
description.content:
/PRNewswire/ -- What if monitoring your heart rate were as easy as listening to music while you jog? Thanks to advances in space technology, an iPhone will soon be able to do double duty: keep you in tune with your favourite artists and your vital signs.
With the support of ESA´s Technology Transfer Programme (ESA TTP), Swiss company CSEM created the final prototype for their Pulsear device this year. A tiny unit embedded in a regular earphone uses infrared signals to see how fast your heart is beating. It sends infrared signals through the tissues in your ear. A tiny photo diode records the results and sends the information via the earphone wires to a device that plugs into your phone.
The result is an accurate reading of your heart rate, without the irritation of wearing a chest belt.
"Lots of people listen to music while they exercise and lots of people find the belts uncomfortable, " said CSEM´s Dr Andrea Ridolfi, "so we thought it made sense to measure heart rate through the ear."
Solution thanks to space-tech
Earlier attempts by CSEM to monitor heart rate using earphones were not satisfactory, said Dr Ridolfi, because the available technology was not sophisticated enough. But that was before CSEM developed a complex chest sensor for measuring astronauts´ blood oxygen levels for ESA´s Long Term Medical Survey system. "Once we were done, " said Dr Ridolfi, "we said, ´let´s recycle this´."
With a grant from the ESA TTP´s ´Technology Transfer Demonstrator´ initiative, CSEM created the prototype. The initiative supports development of new hardware and software to bridge the gap between the space technology and its terrestrial use.
An iPhone application shows your heart rate over time onscreen and compares, say, today´s jog with last week´s. Subjects who tested the app during their fitness training rated the device highly. While the current prototype measures only heart rate, future versions could easily be adapted to measure additional vital signs such as blood oxygen levels. This would open up a number of medical applications.
"Technology transfer from space has a huge potential to spur innovation in areas you wouldn´t expect to find space-tech", explains Frank M. Salzgeber, Head of ESA TTP. "ESA TTP wants to help European industry to apply sophisticated space solutions to their markets."
Open Call for Technology Transfer Demonstrators: http://www.technology-forum.com/demonstrators/
More information: http://www.esa.int/ttp
European Space Agency

description.hltext_display: Briefs: Broncos' Decker outstanding as kick returner
description.content:
The Broncos have seen rookie wide receiver Eric Decker return 17 kickoffs this season, 14 of those coming in the past two games.
"Eric Decker has done a nice job for us in the kickoff return game. Last week in Arizona, he really had an outstanding game," said interim head coach Eric Studesville. "He hit it up in there hard (Sunday) and we still have things to work on. That is a team effort that is not just him. There are 10 other guys out there that have to block for those returns to be successful and we are going to continue working all those people."
Among the NFL players who have at least 17 kickoff returns this season, Decker ranks 12th at 25.2 yards per return.
Foster hobbled.
Texans running back Arian Foster didn't play in the fourth quarter Sunday against the Titans because of hip and ankle injuries.
Texans coach Gary Kubiak said the ankle injury bothered Foster the most. Foster leads the NFL in rushing yards (1,345) and rushing touchdowns (13).
Breaking news.
Asked how veteran quarterback Kyle Orton took the news that rookie Tim Tebow would be the Broncos' starter against the Texans this weekend at Invesco Field at Mile High, Studesville said: "He's a professional. . . . He's in the same physical state he was last week."
Orton missed practice last week because of a rib injury.
Orton has 3,653 yards passing and 20 touchdown passes this season. He needs 150 yards passing and two touchdown passes to set career highs in those categories, which he set last year.
Footnotes.
Studesville said kicker Matt Prater would test his injured right leg today or Thursday before any decision is made about his availability for the Houston game. . . . Tailback Knowshon Moreno will be evaluated for what the team has described as a "side" injury.
Jeff Legwold, The Denver Post

description.hltext_display: La Agencia deberá informar "mejor" sobre los desembalses
description.content:
La Agencia deberá informar "mejor" sobre los desembalses
La Junta mantendrá encuentros bilaterales con cada uno de los municipios afectados por las inundaciones
Un vecino de la urbanización de Guadalvalle, de Córdoba, intenta salvar algunos enseres.
Vehículos atrapados en el lodo en parcelas inundadas en las afueras de Córdoba.
Artículos relacionados
Los alcaldes de los municipos más afectados por las inundaciones obtuvieron ayer del Ejecutivo autonómico el compromiso para que éste ordene a la Agencia Andaluza del Agua que informe "más y mejor" de los desembalses de los pantanos. La Junta también se comprometió ayer con los primeros ediles de estos consistorios a organizar encuentros bilaterales antes de fin de año para establecer un plan de trabajo específico para cada localidad.
Esos encuentros entre Junta y ayuntamientos profundizarán "desde el punto de vista técnico y del conocimiento en las posibles soluciones que den respuesta a una situación que nos preocupa y genera mucha inquietud e impotencia en los ciudadanos afectados", explicó el consejero de Gobernación, Luis Pizarro. En esas reuniones se analizarán con los alcaldes los problemas concretos de cada municipio, al tiempo que se desarrollará el documento de trabajo que se ha presentado este martes en la reunión de coordinación, que contempla 13 puntos relacionados con el sistema de intervención ante emergencias, desembalses de los pantanos o situación de las viviendas presentes en zonas inundables.
"Los alcaldes han mostrado su acuerdo con este documento que recoge las cuestiones que han ido planteando durante estos días y, a partir de ahora, comenzaremos a trabajar de forma inmediata para ir respondiendo a situaciones coyunturales relacionadas con problemas de emergencia, primero, y en soluciones más estructurales a medio plazo, cuando el agua dé una tregua", señaló Pizarro. Además, la Agencia Andaluza del Agua ofrecerá "más información de los desembalses que se lleven a cabo", una cuestión que venían planteando los alcaldes desde hace tiempo
Pizarro quitó aristas a las críticas realizadas por varios alcaldes e hizo hincapié en que "no han cuestionado la política de desembalses de la Junta o los protocolos de actuación, sino que han pedido más información. La Agencia Andaluza del Agua se compromete a que los alcaldes tengan información de una manera real, puntual y veraz de todo lo relacionado con los embalses".
En el documento de trabajo que la Junta presentó ayer a los alcaldes, que contempla 13 puntos, se recogen cuestiones como el compromiso de elaborar un mapa detallado de las zonas inundables, determinando con precisión las áreas de cada municipio ribereño que son susceptibles de sufrir inundación; la determinación de los puntos de máximo riesgo y actuación preferente o la revisión de los planes de emergencia por inundaciones en el ámbito local. Igualmente, se concreta la mejora de los sistemas de coordinación y activación de los planes de emergencia, la identificación de todas las viviendas y edificaciones presentes en zonas anegables por los cauces fluviales, especificando su situación jurídica y su compatibilidad con la legalidad urbanística, así como el estudio de las actuaciones urbanísticas que deberían abordarse, tanto por la Administración autonómica como por las locales para resolver las situaciones anómalas de ocupación por viviendas y edificaciones de conformidad con el planeamiento urbanístico, en zonas susceptibles de inundación.
Asimismo, se establece la mejora del sistema de alarma e información utilizado por las agencias meteorológicas y la del Agua en relación con las precipitaciones y la política cotidiana de desembalses para prever con suficiente rapidez las crecidas de los ríos y arroyos.

description.hltext_display: Fareplay: Nontraditional foods find place at holiday table
description.content:
Top, Jane Steele, right, talks with Oriental Imports owner Consuelo Fong about holiday recipes. Mixing up holiday meals with some ethnic foods can make for a unique experience.
Every year, the holidays come roaring in like a freight train. I work most weekends in December preparing elaborate feasts for others. It's not surprising when I find myself unmotivated for the food part of the festivities when it comes to my own family celebrations. By the time I limp home, I am worn out and tired of anything remotely holiday-ish.
Nontraditional foods have become prevalent in my own holiday celebrations. Soon after Halloween, I make a round of visits to the ethnic grocery stores to stock up on pantry items in preparation for the holidays. I am particularly fond of Oriental Imports, owned by the Fongs. David Fong and his wife, Consuelo, now run the store started by David's father back in 1986.
"We have worked hard to make sure our store succeeds," said Consuelo as she helped me pick out items in the well-stocked aisles of the store. "We have many customers from Juárez, but also people who come from places like Midland and Las Cruces. There is always something new to discover, and if anyone is unfamiliar with the ingredients, they just need to ask us and we can help."
I have shopped at several Asian grocery stores around our city, but the Fongs are always quick to assist me when I have a question. Consuelo revealed her turkey recipe to me, which involved marinating the bird in a mixture of soy sauce, dark Chinese wine, ginger, garlic and green onions. She then steams the turkey part way and finishes it in the oven. Served along with flash fried
bok choy and other Chinese greens, it sounded wonderful, and I kept wondering how one would go about steaming a whole turkey. The answer is to cut it into pieces first. This also helps to keep from overcooking the breast.
Spices including cinnamon, turmeric, star anise and ground coriander add splashes of flavor to my everyday chicken, but when it comes time to celebrate, they feature themselves at the holiday table as well.
If you are unfamiliar with Indian spices, Madhu Sharma, owner of R.V. International Grocery and Indian Market, is more than happy to help educate you.
"I opened the store in 1992," Madhu began. "We wanted to bring the best Indian products to El Paso, and we have. People need to come to the store and look around at all we offer."
The store is packed with fragrant spices, all reasonably priced. On more than one occasion I have found fresh Kaffir lime leaves at the market. I used to think that I needed to do most of the shopping for my ethnic recipes when I left town, but I have since discovered that El Paso has plenty of options in terms of available ethnic products and produce.
Since my husband married a foodie, he knows that gifts for me involve ordering things like fresh New England quail for the holidays. I would take that over a sweater or jewelry any day of the week. Last Christmas, FedEx delivered a box of foie gras to my doorstep the day before New Year's. I was so excited that one might have thought I'd received a new car. We sautéed it with some ground cinnamon, cloves and dried Turkish figs from Jerusalem International Foods. I will remember that New Year's for the rest of my life.
"Most of our products come from Mediterranean countries like Turkey, Pakistan and Iran," Jerusalem International Foods owner Alaa Alquadi began. "Much of it is organic because they do not use many pesticides there. We love to have new customers come in and see all that we offer."
What I enjoy about Alaa's market is the sense of place. Walking into the store is like taking a brief trip to a foreign country. I love taking my kids along because there is always something in the aisle to either interest them or freak them out. My husband would rather die than go to Albertsons, but tell him I need some Garam Masala, and he's out the door in a flash.
Exposing children to different cultures, especially around the holidays, teaches them that the world is a big place, full of flavors. This holiday, consider branching out and adding some new flavors to your table. Our countries may not always get along, but in the culinary world, the holiday table welcomes all. Now, let's feast.
Jane Steele teaches cooking classes. She may be reached at living@elpasotimes.com. This story first appeared in El Paso Style magazine.

description.hltext_display: Stress levels of Indian entrepreneurs on the rise: Regus survey
description.content:
The increasing stress levels among entrepreneurs of Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs), vital for Indian economy clearly identify that their personal lives are closely tied up with their business lives.
An overwhelming 40% of entrepreneurs in India have declared that their stress levels have risen markedly in the past two years, clearly indicating that the difficult economic environment of the past two years has not only left a mark on business attitudes but also on the entrepreneur’s personal lives. However, stress level among entrepreneurs globally is 46%.
The increasing stress levels among entrepreneurs of Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs), vital for Indian economy clearly identify that their personal lives are closely tied up with their business lives.
The survey, conducted by global work-place solutions providing leader, Regus canvassed the opinions of over 5,000 entrepreneurs in 78 countries asking them about their recent revenue and profit trends, along with their main concerns and causes of stress in the past years.
Aside from overall stress levels the Regus survey also examined the major preoccupation behind that stress. In India in particular late payments were the main concern of entrepreneurs followed by lack of cash or working capital to invest and the cost of fixed overheads.
Globally, entrepreneurs related that they are most concerned with falling profits and revenues. The second key concern, however, was a lack of cash or working capital to invest in the economic upturn, followed closely by worries over late payment
The high level of stress among entrepreneurs should ring warning bells among policy makers as SMEs play a vital role for the growth of Indian economy by contributing 45% of industrial output, 40% of exports, employing 60 million people, create 1.3 million jobs every year and produce more than 8000 quality products for the Indian and international markets.
Madhusudan Thakur, Country Head, Regus India, comments: “Small businesses provide an important barometer of growth and innovation in any country. Entrepreneurial success is an indicator for innovation and future wealth generation. Given its importance, the concerns and obstacles faced by this segment are likely to have significant repercussions on the economy as a whole. In India in particular small businesses remain very concerned about key issues such late payments.
“Research by Assocham earlier this year revealed that in India up to 92% of SMEs were relying on personal and family savings, with requests extending to friends and relatives, in order to counter low availability of funds caused by late payments. As SMEs exit a period of economic difficulty and prepare to invest in the upturn their concerns reveal that pressures around securing capital to invest are great. In addition to this SMEs, particularly in India, continue to send out signals to government for additional assistance.”

description.hltext_display: Опит за сваляне на кабел от стълб завърши със смърт
description.content:
Трагедията се е разиграла снощи около 22.30 часа
След пристигането на лекарите и полицаите пострадалият младеж бил адекватен
Още по темата
Санданчанин пострада тежко при опит за кражба на ел. проводници от действащ трафопост, ...
Мъж е пострадал от електрически ток в с. Коста Перчево, съобщиха от ОД на МВР във Видин. ...
етикети
25-годишен мъж е починал тази нощ след опит за сваляне на електрически кабел от стълб край гоцеделчевското село Господинци, съобщи кметът на селото Ахмед Ходжов.
По думите на кмета на селото, трагедията се е разиграла снощи около 22.30 часа, когато починалият заедно с още едно момче от селото отишли да свалят кабел. Това станало между селата Господинци и Балдево, където имал изоставена мина и кабел, висящ от стълб, предаде Фокус.
Младежът се качил на стълба и след опит да пререже кабела, бил ударен от електрически ток. Другият младеж веднага подал сигнал за случилото се до Спешна помощ и полицията. По разказа на кмета на село Господинци, след пристигането на лекарите и полицаите пострадалият младеж бил адекватен, дори разговарял с тях.
По-късно, около 03.00 часа дошла информацията, че е починал. По случая се води разследване.

description.hltext_display: Парното спря в столичния кв. "Лозенец"
description.content:
Работи се по възстановяване на топлоснабдяването
етикети
Спряно е топлоподаването в част от столичния квартал "Лозенец", съобщи "Топлофикация София".
Дружеството уведомява своите клиенти от кв. "Лозенец", живущи между ул. "Майор Томпсън", ул. "Трепетлика" ул. "Бигла", и бул. "Черни връх", че поради авария на топлопровод е спряно топлоподаването.
Създадена е необходимата организация и ще се работи непрекъснато до възстановяване на топлоснабдяването, посочват от "Топлофикация-София".

description.hltext_display: Глухоняма жена проникна незаконно в пощенски клон
description.content:
Още по темата
„Рено Клио” се запали в движение вчера сутринта около 5 часа. Колата е ...
Багер на строителна фирма е прекъснал в 15.07 часа днес разпределителен газопровод на ...
етикети
22-годишна глухоняма жена, проникнала незаконно в помещение на пощенска станция в Монтана, е задържана от служители на районното управление в града, съобщиха от пресцентъра на МВР.
Сигналът за задействана сигнално-охранитителна система в паричния салон на пощенската служба в Монтана бил получен вчера в охранителна фирма от областния град.
Когато пристигнали на местопроизшествието, служителите задържали 22-годишната М.В. от същия град. Оперативна група от РУП-Монтана извършила оглед на местопроизшествието, при който е изяснено, че едно от стъклата на помещението за колетни пратки е счупено.
Станало ясно, че по всяка вероятност тя е действала в съучастие с други жени. По случая е започнато досъдебно производство.
Разследващите полицаи продължават работата за установяване на съучастниците на задържаната. В процес на изясняване е и стойността на причинените материални щети. М.В. ще остане в ареста за срок до 24 часа

description.hltext_display: Възрастен мъж загина в апартамента си при пожар
description.content:
Огнеборците са предотвратили запалване на съседни жилища
Още по темата
Гори къща в Стария град в Пловдив, над хотел „Севън Хил”. Това съобщи Георги ...
Три чуждестранни ТИР-а, натоварени с 24 тона парфюм, 19 тона лешници и текстил, са ...
етикети
83-годишен мъж е загинал при пожар в апартамента си в Дупница. Това съобщиха от Областната дирекция на МВР в Кюстендил.
Инцидентът е станал тази сутрин. Сигналът за пожара е подаден в противопожарната служба в 6.28 часа. Огнеборците са потушили пожара за по-малко от 30 минути, в жилището е открит трупът на самотно живеещия мъж в седнало положение и обгорял.
Евакуирани са от сградата живеещите на последния етаж. Не са пострадали други хора. Огнеборците са предотвратили запалване на съседни жилища.

description.hltext_display: 【有馬記念水曜追い】ブエナビスタ直線伸びた「順調やな」 （競馬）
description.content:
ＪＣ２着から参戦するブエナビスタ（牝４＝松田博）はＣＷコース単走で軽快な行きっぷり。直線は手応え通りにしっかり伸びて、ゴールを駆け抜けた。松田博師は「いつも通り。順調やな。特に言うことない状態で出せるし、力を出せれば結果は付いてくると思う」と期待十分の口ぶりだった。 【有馬記念】

description.hltext_display: そろそろ年賀状の準備を──プリンタ新モデル、売れ筋はエプソン「EP-803A」とキヤノン「PIXUS MG6130」
Мъже в черно обраха бензиностанция
description.content:
По данни на потърпевшия лицата били с черни качулки на главите, облечени в черни дрехи
Нападателите взели оборота, който по това време бил едва 34 лева
Още по темата
Извършител на взломна кражба от магазин за бижута е задържан минути след престъплението в ...
Неизвестен апаш е обрал посред бял ден бензиностанция в близкото до Стара Загора с. ...
етикети
Обир на бензиностанция е извършен снощи в Разград, съобщиха от Областната дирекция на МВР в града.
Около 20.40 часа две лица влизат в бензиностанция “Релакс”, която се намира до бившето ТКЗС в ж.к. “Орел”. Единият от тях нанася удар с пистолет по главата на 32-годишния С.Й., работещ като продавач-консултант в обекта. Нападателите вземат оборота, който по това време бил едва 34 лева. По данни на потърпевшия лицата били с черни качулки на главите, облечени в черни дрехи, високи около 170 см.
След удара побягнали в неизвестна посока. Служителят на бензиностанцията е настанен в Хирургично отделение на разградската болница с контузна рана на главата, без опасност за живота. По случая се води досъдебно производство по чл. 198 от НК.

description.hltext_display: Бременна в петия месец пострада при катастрофа
description.content:
Още по темата
Мъж е в кома след преобръщане на джипа му на пътя Търговище - Разград, съобщиха от ...
Семейство от град Русе катастрофира по пътя Русе – Разград, след село Осенец. Това ...
етикети
Бременна в петия месец жена пострада при катастрофа на пътя между селата Вазово и Райнино. Това съобщиха от Областната дирекция на МВР в Разград.
Инцидентът станал около 17.25 часа вчера. 22-годишен мъж от Райнино управлявал лекия автомобил “Ровър – 45” с несъобразена скорост по заледения път. Изгубил контрол над автомобила и се блъснал в крайпътно дърво. При произшествието е пострадала возещата се на задната седалка Н.О. на 19 години от село Райнино.
Настанена е в исперихската болница, по първоначални данни няма опасност за нейния живот и този на плода. Пробата за алкохол на водача е отрицателна, той е ползвал и обезопасителен колан.
По случая е образувано досъдебно производство по чл. 343 , ал.1, буква Б от НК
